The team that wins the game will gain the right to use the field while the losing team will have to eat the grass. With a hopeless squad of cowards on her team, Karin recruits the help of Soul Reaper Captain Toshiro Hitsugaya, who surprisingly knows a thing or two about soccer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一角, 熱血剣道物語
Ikkaku`s Hot-Blooded Kendo Tale
Ikkaku l`entraîneur de Kendo
Ikkaku, Nekketsu Kendou Monogatari
episode.summary: Karakura First High School`s kendo team is ambushed, and the captain and all of the main members are seriously injured. The injured team members are worried they`ll have to pull out of the regional tournament the following month, but the student body president, Kego`s sister Mizuho, suggests that they have a practice match against their attackers. With all the regulars injured, however, only the freshmen are left. Mizuho asks Ikkaku to train the remaining team members, and for some reason Ikkaku accepts the request. And so begins Ikkaku`s training from hell. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美しきパティシエ, 弓親!
The Beautiful Patissier, Yumichika!
Le beau patissier, Yumichika !
Utsukushiki Patissier, Yumichika!
episode.summary: The Head Captain orders Mayuri Kurotsuchi to simplify the procedures to perform Gentei Kaijo, a restriction release for the Spiritual Pressure of the Advance Troops while in the World of the Living. Rin Tsubokura of the Department of Research and Development is sent to conduct some research in the World of the Living. While in the World of the Living, Rin is escorted by Hanataro Yamada and Yumichika Ayasegawa. In the middle of Rin`s research, they come across a lone soul in front of a cake shop. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: はかられた, コン! 乱菊は見ていた..
Kon is Deceived! Rangiku on the Lookout..
Kon est dupé ! Rangiku sous surveillance
Hakarareta, Kon! Rangiku wa Mite Ita..
episode.summary: Kon, lonely and bored due to Rukia`s and Orihime`s absence, decides to pay a visit to Rangiku. While walking near the river, Rangiku and Kon witness a young girl fall off a bridge when she tries to save her stuffed animal. In order to rescue the girl, Miyuki, Rangiku takes Kon`s soul candy out of his body and throws it into the mouth of the stuffed animal that Miyuki dropped. Kon finds that his duties as the girl`s savior are a little more than he bargained for. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウェコムンドの内乱! ウルキオラの死
Civil War in Hueco Mondo! Ulquiorra`s Death
Guerre civile à l`Hueco Mundo ! La mort d`Ulquiorra
Hueco Mundo no Nairan! Ulquiorra no Shi
episode.summary: Trouble is brewing in Las Noches, Aizen`s palace in the Hollow realm, Hueco Mundo. One of the Arrancars, Patras, rebels against Aizen and tries to steal the Hogyoku. Ulquiorra realizes what Patras is up to, but he is defeated when he is caught off-guard by Menis and Aldegor, who assist Patros in his rebellion. Upon obtaining the Hogyoku, the three go to the World of the Living, where they head to Urahara`s shop in order to find Kisuke Urahara, the creator of the Hogyoku. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪意の戦い, 藍染の罠
Battle of Bad Faith, Aizen`s Trap
La Bataille Malveillante, le piège d`Aizen
Akui no Tatakai, Aizen no Wana
episode.summary: Renji`s fight with Patras continues as it destroys Urahara`s shop and parts of Karakura Town. Repeatedly overpowered by Patras`s attacks, Renji leads the Arrancar into Urahara`s underground training facility where he can safely use his Bankai. Meanwhile, Hitsugaya and the others engage Menis and Aldegor while the Arrancars are in their released state. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウェコムンド再動! 日番谷vsヤミー
Second Move of Hueco Mundo! Hitsugaya vs Yammy
Deuxième déplacement du Hueco Mundo ! Hitsugaya vs Yammy
Hueco Mundo Saidou! Hitsugaya vs Yammy
episode.summary: There are only a few months left until the showdown with the Arrancars. Ichigo continues to train with the Visoreds, but the amount of time in which he can remain Hollowfied hasn`t increased by much. In the Soul Society, Rukia and Orihime have also been undergoing rigorous training. Ukitake happily watches the two and is pleased that Rukia finally has friends. Sosuke Aizen may have plans to cut their training short as he calls on his Espada. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護VSグリムジョー, 11秒の戦い!
Ichigo vs Grimmjow, 11 Seconds Battle!
Ichigo vs Grimmjow, La bataille de 11 secondes !
Ichigo VS Grimmjow, Juuichibyou no Tatakai!
episode.summary: Arrancars suddenly appear in the World of the Living. Yammy, Luppi, Grimmjow, and Wonderweiss are confronted by Hitsugaya`s advance troops and Ichigo. Ichigo fights Grimmjow and immediately uses his Bankai. Meanwhile, Luppi, the newest Espada Number Six, takes on Hitsugaya and his troops by himself. He releases his Zanpakuto and knocks down Hitsugaya with the tremendous force of his eight tentacles. His tentacles then set their sights on Rangiku, Ikkaku, and Yumichika. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 策謀のウルキオラ, 太陽が沈む時
Ulquiorra`s Scheme, the Moment When the Sun Sets
Le projet d`Ulquiorra, le moment où le soleil se lève !
Sakubou no Ulquiorra, Taiyou ga Shizumu Toki
episode.summary: Hitsugaya`s advance troops continue to fight the Arrancars who appeared in Karakura Town. Urahara shows up to help. He dodges Wonderweiss, but Yammy hits him with a flurry of Bala attacks. Meanwhile, Rangiku, Ikkaku and Yumichika are having trouble fighting Espada Number Six, Luppi, who has released his zanpakuto. And on the other side of town Ichigo has cornered Grimmjow. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さよなら..., 黒崎くん
Goodbye..., Kurosaki
Adieu..., Kurosaki-kun !
Sayonara..., Kurosaki-kun
episode.summary: Ichigo and his friends manage to drive away Grimmjow and the other Arrancars. But behind the scenes, Aizen orders Ulquiorra to bring Orihime to Hueco Mundo. Orihime agrees to go in exchange for the safety of her friends. She is given a twelve-hour reprieve and is allowed to say her farewells to only one person. Orihime prepares herself and leaves her room to say goodbye to the one person she has in mind. Meanwhile, Hitsugaya and the others are recovering from the injuries they received from their fight with the Arrancars. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 厳命! 井上織姫ノ救出ヲ禁ズ
Strict Order! The Forbidden Rescue of Inoue Orihime
Ordre strict ! Interdiction de sauver Inoue Orihime
Genmei! Inoue Orihime no Kyujutsu o Kinzu
episode.summary: Ichigo awakens to realize that the serious injuries he received from Grimmjow`s attack have completely healed. He senses that Orihime came to his room from the traces of Spiritual Pressure that she left behind. Hitsugaya comes to get Ichigo, and they head to Orihime`s room. Ichigo senses that something is odd when he sees Rukia and the others gathered there. A transmission comes in from the Soul Society and Captain Ukitake appears on the monitor. He tells them the terrifying truth: that Orihime is with the Arrancars and may already be dead. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復活のグリムジョー
Revival of Grimmjow
La renaissance de Grimmjow
Fukkatsu no Grimmjow
episode.summary: Orihime has been kidnapped by Sosuke Aizen and the Arrancars. Ichigo decides to go to Hueco Mundo in order to save her. He visits Urahara`s shop and finds Uryu and Chad waiting for him. They have both finished their training and are ready to join Ichigo in the rescue of Orihime. Meanwhile, in Hueco Mundo, Orihime is brought before Aizen in his palace, Las Noches. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 石田・チャド, 新しき力の胎動
Ishida, Chad, the Quickening of a New Power
Ishida-Chad, l`accélération d`un nouveau pouvoir
Ishida, Chad, Atarashiki Chikara no Taidou
episode.summary: Ichigo, Uryu, and Chad charge through the Garganta and into Hueco Mundo. There, they find themselves in a large corridor. They set off deeper into the building to search for Orihime, but as they move further down the corridor they find many traps left for them by the Arrancars. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エスパーダ集結! 藍染の御前会議
The Espada Gather! Aizen`s Royal Assembly
L`Espada se réunit ! L`assemblée royale d`Aizen
Espada Shuuketsu! Aizen no Gozen Kaigi
episode.summary: Ichigo and his friends defeat the Arrancars Iceringer and Demora, whom they meet in underground corridor 22. They escape the underground just as it begins to crumble and come out onto the surface of Hueco Mundo. It is a world of night and white sand. They immediately find Aizen`s palace, Las Noches, and are awed by its size. Meanwhile, Aizen calls a meeting with all of the Espada. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: その名はネル! 不思議なアランカル登場
Her Name is Nel! The Appearance of the Strange Arrancar
Son nom est Nell ! L`apparence de l`étrange arrancar
Sono Na wa Nel! Fushigi na Arrancar Toujou
episode.summary: Ichigo and his friends save a girl who is being attacked by mysterious Arrancars. The girl is also an Arrancar, named Nel, and as it turns out, she was only playing tag with her Arrancar friends, Pesche and Dondochakka. Nel and her friends are oddly cheery, but when they realize that Ichigo is a Soul Reaper, they worry that Aizen will scold them for letting their enemies roam freely. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 1
Opening 2
Opening 3
Opening 4
Ending 1
Ending 2
Ending 3a
Ending 4
Ending 5a
Ending 6
Ending 7
Ending 8
Ending 3k
Ending 3f
Ending 3b
Ending 3e
Ending 3i
Ending 3h
Ending 3l
Ending 3g
Ending 3j
Ending 3c
Ending 3d
Ending 3m
メノスの森! 消えたルキアを探せ!
The Forest of Menos! The Search for the Missing Rukia
Forêt de Menos ! La recherche de la disparue Rukia
Menos no Mori! Kieta Rukia o Sagase!
episode.summary: In a second attempt to defeat Runuganga, the Guardian of the White Sands, Rukia uses Sodenoshirayuki, but her attack backfires when she accidentally stabs Bawabawa in the back. Startled by his injury, Bawabawa begins flailing and sends Rukia flying through the air. Ichigo and his friends are swallowed by the desert of Hueco Mundo and fall into the Menos Forest, home of the Menos. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アシド, 過去から来た死神
Ashido, the Shinigami Who Came from the Past
Le shinigami qui venait du passé
Ashido, Kako kara Kita Shinigami
episode.summary: Ichigo and his friends have fallen into the Menos Forest. They fight off attacks from Gillians while they look for Rukia and Nel, who have been separated from the group. Rukia is hiding out of harm`s way with a mysterious Soul Reaper named Ashido, and Nel was taken away by a group of Hollows. Just as Rukia and Ashido notice a drop in Ichigo`s Spiritual Pressure, they sense something else in the forest approaching. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 崩れ行く森, 百万のメノス
Through the Crumbling Forest, a Million Menos
L`effondrement de la forêt
Kuzure Iku Mori, Hyuakuman no Menos
episode.summary: Ashido and Rukia continue to battle Pequenos, one of the Adjuchas who controls the Menos Forest. Pequenos attacks at full strength to try to end the long-shared enmity between him and Ashido. Meanwhile, Ichigo, Chad, Uryu, and Renji follow Nel and her friends` Spiritual Pressure to the depths of the Menos Forest. They find that Nel and her friends have been captured. At that moment, they are surrounded by a tremendous number of Gillians. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誓い! 再び生きてこの場所へ
Oath! Back Here Alive Again
Revenir ici vivant
Chikai! Futatabi Ikite Kono Basho e
episode.summary: Ichigo and his friends arrive at Las Noches, Aizen`s stronghold, where they break through a wall and charge into the palace. Ichigo tries to leave Nel behind, but she follows Ichigo into the palace and cries as she chases after him. At first Ichigo ignores her, but when he finally gives in, Nel suddenly disappears. In the darkness, Ichigo and his friends search the area where they last heard Nel`s voice and find a hole that leads underground. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 吹き荒れる暴風! 踊るアランカルとの遭遇
The Raging Storm! Encounter with the Dancing Arrancar
La tempête hurlante ! Rencontre avec l`Arrancar dansant
Fukiareru Boufuu! Odoru Arrancar to no Souguu
episode.summary: Ichigo, Uryu, Chad, Rukia, and Renji go their separate ways down the corridors of Las Noches and vow to safely reunite. Ichigo heads down a pathway on his own, but he is followed by Nel. He has no choice but to allow her to join him in order to keep her safe. Suddenly, he senses someone`s Spiritual Pressure. An Arrancar named Dordoni stands in Ichigo and Nel`s way. Dordoni is Espada Number 103 and doesn`t appear to be very strong. Ichigo unenthusiastically accepts his challenge. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護反撃! こいつが俺の卍解だ
Ichigo Strikes Back! This is my Bankai
Ichigo riposte ! Voici mon bankai
Ichigo Hangeki! Koitsu ga Ore no Bankai Da
episode.summary: Dordoni the Arrancar is a Privaron Espada, a former Espada. Ichigo underestimates his strength and is quickly driven into a corner when Dordoni releases his Zanpakuto. Dordoni pushes Ichigo and demands to see his Bankai, but Ichigo refuses. He wants to fight Dordoni as he is in order to conserve his strength. Dordoni loses his temper and releases the blast of a massive Cero at Ichigo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪魔の研究! ザエルアポロの企み
The Devilish Research! Szayel Aporro`s Plan
Recherche diabolique ! Le plan de Szayel Aporro
Akuma no Kenkyuu! Szayel Aporro no Takurami
episode.summary: Dordoni makes a final attempt to win his battle, but he is defeated by a Hollowfied Ichigo. As Ichigo and Nel continue on their way to Las Noches, the Exequias, Hueco Mundo`s execution squad, arrive to finish off Ichigo. Meanwhile, Uryu and Chad also move into the Privaron Espada area and begin fierce battles with triple-digit Arrancars. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルキアと海燕, 哀しみの再会
Rukia and Kaien, the Sorrowful Reunion
Rukia et Kaien ! Réunion douloureuse !
Rukia to Kaien, Kanashimi no Saikai
episode.summary: In the depths of Las Noches, Rukia encounters Ninth Espada Aaroniero Arruruerie in an area with a blue sky. Aaroniero lures Rukia into a room and removes his mask. Underneath his mask is the face of Kaien Shiba, the former Thirteenth Squad Lieutenant who is supposed to be dead. Rukia is confused, but Kaien talks with her as if nothing happened. Kaien explains that because of the ability of the Hollow that took control of him right before he died, he was thrust into Hueco Mundo, where he was reborn. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルキア反撃! 決死の鬼道を放て
Rukia Retaliates! Release the Desperate Kidou
Rukia riposte ! Le Kidou désespéré
Rukia Hangeki! Kesshi no Kidou o Hanate
episode.summary: Rukia is angered when Kaien tells her to hand over her friends in return for letting her go and is convinced that this Kaien is a fake. She attacks Kaien with every technique she knows, but he dodges them all. Kaien claims that he knows all about Rukia`s ability because he`s the real Kaien. When he releases his Zanpakuto, Nejibana, Rukia struggles to believe that this person could actually be her former lieutenant. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 石田&ペッシェ, 友情の合体攻撃
Ishida & Pesshe, the United Attack of Friendship
Ishida et Pesche, l`attaque unifiée de l`amitié
Ishida & Pesshe, Yuujou no Gattai Kougeki
episode.summary: Uryu is having a tough time fighting against Privaron Espada Cirucci, whose whip attacks are ever changing. Pesche, who has come looking for Nel, stumbles upon Uryu`s fight with Cirucci instead. Pesche attempts to run away in terror but is distracted when his eye catches the miniskirt of Cirucci who is standing on a high pillar. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 石田の切り札, 魂を切り裂くもの
Ishida`s Trump Card, Seele Schneider
L`atout d`Ishida, Le Faucheur d`Âmes
Ishida no Kirifuda, Tamashii o Kirisaku Mono
episode.summary: Pesche`s unusual ability allows Uryu to damage Cirucci. Cirucci releases her Zanpakuto and attacks the two until she has them cornered. Uryu uses Seeleschneider, the only bladed Quincy weapon, to counter her attacks as they get closer and closer. With Seeleschneider Uryu is able to cut through Cirucci`s feathers. Figuring that her attacks will no longer that work against Uryu, Cirucci does something unexpected Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 巨人の右腕, 悪魔の左腕
Right Arm of the Giant, Left Arm of the Devil
Bras droit du Géant, Bras gauche du Diable
Kyojin no Uwan, Akuma no Sawan
episode.summary: Chad faces the Privaron Espada Gantenbainne and survives many of his fierce attacks. Chad reveals the power of his right arm, Brazo Derecho Del Gigante. Ever since he entered Hueco Mundo, Chad has sensed that his powers are closer to that of a Hollow`s rather than a Soul Reaper or a Quincy. Cornered, Gantenbainne releases his Zanpakuto to defend against Chad`s powerful attacks. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 茶渡泰虎死す! 織姫の涙
Sado Yasutora Dies! Orihime`s Tears
Yasutora Sado meurt ! Les larmes d`Orihime
Sado Yasutora Shisu! Orihime no Namida
episode.summary: Nnoitra, one of the Espada, suddenly appears and defeats Chad in a single strike. Ichigo, Uryu, and Renji sense Chad`s Spiritual Pressure grow weaker, but they are too far away to help him. Orihime, who is still being held by the Arrancars, also senses Chad`s Spiritual Pressure. At that moment, Ulquiorra enters Orihime`s room and informs her that her friends will soon perish. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遺言, 心は此処に...
Testament, Your Heart is Right Here...
Testament - Ton cœur est ici
Yuigon, Kokoro wa Koko ni...
episode.summary: Aaroniero has the ability to utilize the Spiritual Pressure of the Hollows that he devours. He devoured the body of the Hollow Metastacia that fused itself with Lieutenant Kaien Shiba before it died. Now he uses his power to gain its memory and abilities. Rukia, who is the Soul Reaper responsible for bringing down Metastacia while it was possessing Kaien`s body, is shocked to see her former lieutenant before her. As Aaroniero releases his Zanpakuto, Rukia struggles to find the will to defend against his attacks Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 残酷な破面, ウルキオラの挑発
The Cruel Arrancar, Ulquiorra`s Provocation
Le cruel arrancar, la provocation d`Ulquiorra
Zankoku na Arrancar, Ulquiorra no Chouhatsu
episode.summary: Renji meets Espada Number Eight, Szayel Aporro Grantz. Renji attempts to use his Bankai but fails because of restrictions that Szayel Aporro has placed on the room they are in that limit Renji`s power. Szayel Aporro has extensive information on Renji`s abilities. He plans to capture Renji unharmed so he can conduct further research on him. Meanwhile, all of the Espada in Las Noches are informed that Rukia defeated Espada Number Nine, Aaroniero. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 笑うザエルアポロ, 恋次包囲網完成
Szayel Aporro Laughs, The Net Trapping Renji is Complete
Le rire de Szayel Aporro, Renji complètement piégé
Warau Szayel Aporro, Renji Houimou Kansei
episode.summary: Ichigo and Ulquiorra begin to fight in the depths of Las Noches. Ichigo fights Ulquiorra at full power right from the start, using his Bankai and even his Hollowfication. Ulquiorra is overwhelmed by his great strength, but strategically retaliates when Ichigo removes his Hollow`s mask. Meanwhile, Renji`s Bankai is sealed away as he fights Szayel Aporro. Szayel Aporro continues to have a home-field advantage as he effortlessly blocks Renji`s attacks and calls on some of his subordinates Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死神とクインシー, 狂気との戦い
Shinigami and Quincy, the Battle with Madness
Shinigami et Quincy, la folie de la bataille
Shinigami to Quincy, Kyouki to no Tatakai
episode.summary: Lolly and Menoly are jealous that Aizen is treating Orihime well, so they go to Orihime`s room to harass her. Orihime tries to stay strong, but they are relentless. At that moment, Grimmjow comes to Orihime`s room. Meanwhile, Uryu comes to help Renji, and joins the fight against Szayel Aporro. Uryu takes advantage of an opening and pierces Szayel Aporro with Seeleschneider`s blade. Szayel Aporro collapses, but Uryu is shocked when Seeleschneider suddenly disappears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 石田の作戦! 攻防の20秒
Ishida`s Strategy, the 20-second Offense and Defense
La stratégie d`Ishida, les 20 secondes d`attaque-défense
Ishida no Sakusen! Koubou no Nijuubyou
episode.summary: Szayel Aporro has analyzed Uryu`s and Renji`s Spiritual Pressures and has sealed away most of their abilities. The two decide to work together. Uryu says that he has a plan if Renji can stall Szayel Aporro for twenty seconds. Renji agrees and charges in, but Szayel Aporro easily deflects Zabimaru`s attacks. Meanwhile, Ichigo has been defeated by Ulquiorra and has lost consciousness. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 殺意沸騰! 歓喜のグリムジョー
The Murderous Intent Boils! The Joyful Grimmjow
Bouillantes intentions meurtrières ! La joie de Grimmjow
Satsui Futtou! Kanki no Grimmjow
episode.summary: Grimmjow takes Orihime without permission and forces her to heal Ichigo. He wants to settle things with Ichigo while he`s in his best condition. But before Ichigo`s wounds heal, Ulquiorra comes when he realizes what`s going on. Ulquiorra stops Ichigo`s healing and demands that Grimmjow hand Orihime over to him. Grimmjow refuses and attacks Ulquiorra. The clashing Spiritual Pressures of the two Espada shake Las Noches. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死力VS死力! ホロウ化した一護
Desperate Effort VS Desperate Effort! The Hollowized Ichigo
Effort désespéré contre effort désespéré ! La Hollowmorphose d`Ichigo
Shiryoku VS Shiryoku! Hollow-ka Shita Ichigo
episode.summary: A wild battle begins between Ichigo and Grimmjow. As swords and Spiritual Pressures clash, Grimmjow unleashes his strongest Cero, the Gran Rey Cero. Orihime and Nel are about to be caught in the attack, so Ichigo Hollowfies in order to save them. Grimmjow shouts for joy when faced with Ichigo`s power. He releases his Zanpakuto and shows his most powerful form. Orihime watches as the battle rages on. She becomes frightened when she compares Ichigo`s ominous Spiritual Pressure to that of her brother who became a Hollow. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決着の時, グリムジョーの最後
The Moment of Conclusion, the End of Grimmjow
Le temps de la conclusion, la fin de Grimmjow
Kecchaku no Toki, Grimmjow no Saigo
episode.summary: Ichigo hits Grimmjow with a mighty blow. Grimmjow is about to collapse, but he grabs Zangetsu and pulls himself up. He begins to remember his time as an Adjucha, a Hollow that has an extreme hunger for souls. They continue to obsessively devour souls until they reach the level of Gillians, and then finally they become Adjuchas. But those who become Adjuchas have the fear of degenerating. If they don`t continue to consume Hollows, they will degenerate into Gillians. Grimmjow continues to attack his fellow Hollows until he meets an interesting band of Adjuchas. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新隊長登場! その名は天貝繍助
The New Captain Appears! His name is Amagai Shuusuke
Le nouveau capitaine apparait ! Son nom est Shûsuke Amagai
Shin Taichou Toujou! Sono Na wa Amagai Shuusuke
episode.summary: A new captain joins Squad 3, taking the place of the rebel Gin Ichimaru. His name is Shusuke Amagai. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新展開, 危険な転校生現る!
New Development, the Dangerous Transfer Student Appears!
Nouveau développement ! Un dangereux étudiant transféré apparaît !
Shin Tenkai, Kiken na Tenkousei Arawaru!
episode.summary: In the middle of the night, a strange Senkaimon opens in Karakura Town, and a mysterious team of three arrives in the World of the Living. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 月夜の死闘, 謎の刺客と斬魄刀
Desperate Struggle Under the Moonlit Night, the Mysterious Assassin and Zanpakutou
Lutte désespérée sous le clair de lune. l`assassin mystérieux et son Zanpakutô
Tsukiyo no Shitou, Nazo no Shikaku to Zanpakutou
episode.summary: A mysterious team of three transfers into Ichigo’s class. Their names are Rurichiyo Kasumiohji, Kenryu, and Enryu. Rurichiyo acts like a princess, and Kenryu and Enryu obsessively guard her surroundings. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 犬龍, 咲き乱れる紅の華
Kenryuu, the Profusion of Blooming Crimson Flowers
Kenryu, la profusion des florissantes fleurs cramoisies
Kenryuu, Sakimidareru Beni no Hana
episode.summary: Ichigo and Rukia assume the responsibility of being Rurichiyo’s bodyguard. It is Rurichiyo’s first time in the World of the Living, and she asks Ichigo to teach her about everything she sees. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 貴船出陣! 吹き荒れる烈風
Kibune Goes to War! The Violent Wind that Rages
Kifune part en guerre ! Le vent violent fait rage !
Kibune Shutsujin! Fukiareru Reppuu
episode.summary: Since welcoming Shusuke Amagai as the new captain, Squad 3 has been hard at work. But the duties Shusuke assigns them are tasks that one couldn’t imagine a Soul Reaper doing. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 巨悪の登場! 霞大路家の闇
The Appearance of the Great Evil! The Darkness in the House of Kasumiooji
L`apparition du grand mal ! Les ténèbres dans la maison de Kasumiôji !
Kyoaku no Toujou! Kasumioojike no Yami
episode.summary: One morning, Rurichiyo suddenly disappears. Kenryu finds some indication that leads him to believe that she used the Kasumiohji Clan’s private Senkaimon to return to the Soul Society. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 囚われた一護, 鏡の結界を破れ!
Captured Ichigo, Shatter the Mirror`s Barrier!
Brise la limite du miroir ! La captivité d`Ichigo
Torawareta Ichigo, Kagami no Kekkai o Yabure!
episode.summary: Ichigo returns to the World of the Living, and he draws up a countermeasure at Kisuke Urahara’s shop. When everyone leaves Urahara’s shop, they come across Hanza Nukui, the head of an assassination squad. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐の刺客, 狙われた一護
The Revenging Assassin, Ichigo is Targeted
La vengeance de l`assassin. Ichigo est ciblé
Fukushuu no Shikaku, Nerawareta Ichigo
episode.summary: Hanza Nukui has misjudged the power of Ichigo and his friends, and has failed to assassinate Rurichiyo. He forms a unit of assassins, armed with powerful Bakkouto swords, and prepares to go back to the World of the Living. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怪奇! 刀を喰う暗殺者
Mystery! The Sword-Consuming Assassin
Mystère ! L`épée qui consummait l`assassin
Kaiki! Katana o Kuu Ansatsusha
episode.summary: Hanza Nukui and his team of assassins, armed with Bakkoutos, arrive in the World of the Living, and they challenge Ichigo and the others to fight. Jinnai Douko appears before Rurichiyo wielding a Bakkouto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆転のルキア! 暴走する刀
The Reversal of Rukia, the Rampaging Blade
Le retour de Rukia ! La lame qui se déchaîne !
Gyakuten no Rukia! Bousousuru Katana
episode.summary: The respective battles of Rukia, Uryu, and Chad continue. Jinnai Douko becomes one with his Bakkouto, Retsurai, and keeps attacking. Rukia has a tough battle against Jinnai, whose whole body transforms into a weapon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 見せられた悪夢, 鏡の中の一護
The Nightmare Which is Shown, Ichigo`s Inside the Mirror
Le cauchemar révélé. Ichigo à l`intérieur du miroir
Miserareta Akumu, Kagami no Naka no Ichigo
episode.summary: Hanza Nukui uses his Bakkouto, Saiga’s weak point, to act as a trap for Ichigo. Ichigo ends up getting caught in Hanza’s scheme, an expanse of mirrors. The mirrors take the memories of the captive and turn them into nightmares. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 対立!? 天貝VS護廷十三隊
Confrontation?! Amagai vs. Gotei 13
Confrontation !? Amagai contre les treize Divisons
Tairitsu!? Amagai VS Gotei Juusan Tai
episode.summary: At a captain’s meeting in the Soul Society, Shusuke Amagai proposes to the Thirteen Court Guard Squads that they train directly with the squads. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 姫の決意, 哀しき花嫁
The Princess` Decision, the Sorrowful Bride
La décision de la princesse. La mariée affligée
Hime no Ketsui, Kanashiki Hanayome
episode.summary: Ichigo and his friends have narrowly escaped Hanza Nukui’s team’s attacks. But Uryu and Chad have been inundated with the Spirit Energy of Bakkoutos, and Orihime’s healing power doesn’t seem to be working. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二番隊出撃! 包囲された一護
The 2nd Division Sorties! Ichigo is Surrounded
Le déploiement de la 2e Division ! Ichigo est encerclé
Niban Tai Shutsugeki! Houisareta Ichigo
episode.summary: Rurichiyo has gone back to the Soul Society to take back control of the Kasumiohji Clan. Ichigo, Rukia, Kenryu, and Enryu follow her through the Senkaimon, and they barge in on Rurichiyo and Shu’s wedding at the Kasumiohji palace. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天貝の実力, 斬魄刀解放!
Amagai`s True Strength, the Released Zanpakutou!
La véritable force d`Amagai. Le Zanpakuto est libéré !
Amagai no Jitsuryoku, Zanpakutou Kaihou!
episode.summary: Ichigo and Rukia are being chased down by the Thirteen Court Guard Squads after sabotaging Rurichiyo and Shu’s wedding and taking Shu hostage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動き出した闇! 貴船(きぶね)の正体
The Darkness Which Moves! Kibune`s True Colors
L`obscurité se déplace ! Le vrai visage de Kibune
Ugokidashita Yami! Kibune no Shoutai
episode.summary: After Shu Kannogi tearfully tells Shusuke Amagai how he feels, Shusuke loses his feelings of ill will towards Ichigo and instead decides to help in their search for Rurichiyo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 吉良と貴船, 三番隊の攻防
Kira and Kibune, Offense and Defense of 3rd Division
Kira et Kibune, l`attaque et la défense de la 3e Division
Kira to Kibune, Sanban Tai no Koubou
episode.summary: The Soul Reapers stop chasing after Ichigo for the time being and focus on restoring order in the Seireitei. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 氷と炎! 天貝VS日番谷の激闘
Ice and Flame! Fierce Fight of Amagai vs. Hitsugaya
Glace et Flamme ! La Lutte féroce : Amagai contre Hitsugaya !
Koori to Honoo! Amagai VS Hitsugaya no Gekitou
episode.summary: The intense battle between Izuru Kira and Makoto Kibune continues at Squad Three’s training facility. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 出撃指令! 霞大路家を制圧せよ
Sortie Orders! Suppress the House of Kasumiooji
Ordre de sortie ! Supprimez la maison de Kasumiôji
Shutsugeki Shirei! Kasumioojike o Seiatsu Seyo
episode.summary: At the Head Captain’s command, all the Soul Reapers of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads break into the Kasumiohji Clan’s palace at once. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護激怒! 暗殺者の秘密
Ichigo Rages! The Assassin`s Secret
Ichigo fait rage ! Le secret de l`assassin
Ichigo Gekido! Ansatsusha no Himitsu
episode.summary: The battle at the Kasumiohji Clan’s palace between the Thirteen Court Guard Squads and the Kasumiohji Clan’s assassins continues. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決闘! 天貝VS一護
Duel! Amagai vs. Ichigo
Duel ! Amagai contre Ichigo !
Kettou! Amagai VS Ichigo
episode.summary: The chaos in the Kasumiohji Clan was all a scheme formulated by Shusuke Amagai. Shusuke joined the Thirteen Court Guard Squads in order to avenge his father’s death at the hands of Head Captain Yamamoto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 堕ちた死神の誇り
The Fallen Shinigami`s Pride
La fierté du Shinigami tombé
Ochita Shinigami no Hokori
episode.summary: Shusuke Amagai wields both a Bakkouto, which seals the powers of Soul Reapers, and his Bankai, Raika Gouenkaku. Ichigo defends against Shusuke`s Bankai while Hollowfied and counterattacks with his most powerful Getsugatensho. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウェコムンド編, 再開!
Hueco Mundo Chapter, Restart!
Arc Hueco Mundo : Reprise !
Hueco Mundo Hen, Saikai!
episode.summary: The Hueco Mundo Arc, which was put on hold for the New Captain Shusuke Amagai Arc, resumes. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐宴, ザエルアポロ劇場
Szayel Aporro`s Theater
Le banquet effrayant. Le théâtre de Szayel Aporro
Kyouen, Szayel Aporro Gekijou
episode.summary: Uryu and Renji thought they had escaped, but they find themselves back at Szayelaporro`s palace. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネルの秘密, 巨乳美女参戦!?
The Secret of Nel
Une beauté participe à la bataille, le secret de Nell ?!
Nel no Himitsu, Kyonyuu Bijo Sansen!?
episode.summary: After finding Nel hiding in the shadow of a rock, Nnoitora tells Ichigo`s group that Nel is actually a former Espada. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 抵抗不能, 恐怖の人形劇
The Irresistable, Puppet Show of Terror
L`irrésistible spectacle de marionnettes de terreur
Teikou Funou, Kyoufu no Ningyougeki
episode.summary: Uryu and Renji continue fighting their clones. But no matter how many times they beat them, the clones turn back into liquid, multiply, and revive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネリエルの過去
Neliel`s Past
Le passé de Nell
Neliel no Kako
episode.summary: Nnoitora and Nelliel continue to battle. They are nearly equal in strength. The two of them used to fight side by side as fellow Espadas. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ペッシェの本気
Pesche`s Seriousness
L`union ultime! Le sérieux de Pesche
Pesche no Honki
episode.summary: Nelliel regains her memory, and Pesche and Dondochakka realize that she is going to give her all in the battle against Nnoitora. In order to go fight with Nelliel, Pesche and Dondochakka summon all their strength. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強死神軍団登場
The Strongest Shinigami Army Appears
La plus forte armée des Shinigamis apparaît !
Saikyou Shinigami Gundan Toujou
episode.summary: Just when Nelliel and Nnoitora`s battle is about to come to an end, something unexpected happens to Nelliel`s body. Ichigo`s group find themselves in a sticky situation yet again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白哉卍解, 静かなる怒り
Byakuya`s Bankai, the Quiet Anger
Le Bankai de Byakuya. La colère tranquille
Byakuya Bankai, Shizukanaru Ikari
episode.summary: Byakuya visits Rukia, who is unconscious after being injured in the battle against Aaroniero Arruruerie. Zommari Rureaux, Espada Number 7, happens to be there, attempting to finish her off. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 2人の科学者, マユリの罠
The Two Scientists, Mayuri`s Trap
Les deux scientifiques. Le piège de Mayuri
Futari no Kagakusha, Mayuri no Wana
episode.summary: Zommari`s technique, "Amor," takes control over anything its eyes gaze upon. He uses this power to control Rukia`s body and use her as a shield. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 蘇るザエルアポロ
The Resurrecting Szayel Aporro
Sainte naissance. La résurrection de Szayel Aporro
Yomigaeru Szayel Aporro
episode.summary: Szayelaporro is exasperated when his powers don`t work at all against Mayuri Kurotsuchi, and he ends up being enveloped by Mayuri`s Konjiki Ashisogijizo. Just then, something happens to Nemu, who was being held hostage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ノイトラを斬れ
Nnoitra is Cut Down
Le corps le plus dur?! Nnoitra se met en colère
Nnoitra o Kire
episode.summary: Szayelaporro used his prisoner Nemu as a medium to come back to life. However, Nemu`s body is permeated with the new medicine that Mayuri developed. Szayelaporro experiences the dreadful effects of the medicine himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ノイトラ解放! 増殖した腕
Nnoitra Releases! The Multiplying Arms
Nnoitra libéré! La prolifération des armes
Nnoitra Kaihou! Zoushoku Shita Ude
episode.summary: Kenpachi goes after Nnoitora`s eye and pierces his eye patch, but the eye patch was hiding a dreadful secret. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘決着! 最強は誰だ
Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Who`s the Strongest
Conclusion de violents combats ! Qui est le plus fort ?
Gekitou Kecchaku! Saikyou wa Dare Da
episode.summary: When Kenpachi`s eye patch comes off, releasing his Spiritual Pressure and true strength, Nnoitora invokes his sword attack, Santa Teresa. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 藍染VS死神
Aizen vs. Shinigami
Réunion à Karakura ! Aizen contre les Shinigamis !
Aizen VS Shinigami
episode.summary: Nnoitora has never shown any mercy to his opponents, and he has always finished them off. Nnoitora`s reason for fighting has always been purely to fight. He has been fighting and becoming stronger, hoping to someday die in battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護の切腹説得作戦
Ichigo`s Seppuku Persuasion Strategy
Le Seppuku d`Ichigo ! Stratégie de persuasion
Ichigo no Seppuku Settoku Sakusen
episode.summary: Rurichiyo Kasumiohji, who supposedly became the head of the family, goes off to the World of the Living by herself after getting in a fight with Kenryu. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドキ! 虚だらけの蹴鞠大会
Thump! The Football Tournament of Hollows
Fureur ! Le tournoi de football des Shinigamis !
Doki! Hollow Darake no Kemari Taikai
episode.summary: Rurichiyo and Kenryu`s fight was over how to revitalize the Kasumiohji Clan. Rurichiyo is concerned about the low spirits of her people, and she wants to host a soccer tournament. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 過去編開始! 110年前の真実
The Past Chapter Begins! The Truth from 110 Years Ago
Le chapitre du passé commence! La vérité, 110 ans plus tôt
Kako Hen Kaishi! 110 Nen Mae no Shinjitsu
episode.summary: In the Soul Society 110 years ago, the Thirteen Court Guard Squads are made up of unfamiliar faces. The captain of Squad Five is the masked Visored, Shinji Hirako who currently resides in the World of the Living. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 十二番隊新隊長, 浦原喜助
12th Division`s New Captain, Urahara Kisuke
Le nouveau capitaine de la 12e division, Urahara Kisuke
Juu-Ni-Ban Tai Shin Taichou, Urahara Kisuke
episode.summary: Kisuke Urahara replaces the newly promoted Kirio Hikifune as captain of Squad Twelve. Hiyori Sarugaki, lieutenant of Squad Twelve, cannot hide her dissatisfaction with the new captain. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 藍染と天才少年
Aizen and the Boy Genius
Aizen et le petit génie
Aizen to Tensai Shounen
episode.summary: Kisuke takes Hiyori to the Special underground Confinement Unit inside the Squad Two barracks. Nicknamed the Maggot`s Nest, this place imprisons enlisted Thirteen Court Guard Squad members whose beliefs or actions have been deemed dangerous. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 六車九番隊, 出動せよ
Muguruma`s 9th Division, Sets Out
Muguruma de la 9e division part
Muguruma Kyuu-Ban Tai, Shutsudou Seyo
episode.summary: Nine years have passed since Kisuke Urahara was appointed captain of Squad Twelve. Bizarre deaths start to occur in the Rukon District where people disappear, leaving only their clothes behind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひよ里死す? 悲劇の始まり
Hiyori Dies? The Beginning of Tragedy
Hiyori meurt ? Le début de la tragédie
Hiyori Shisu? Higeki no Hajimari
episode.summary: Kensei Muguruma`s and Mashiro Kuna`s Spiritual Pressure disappears. The Seireitei deems this a dire situation. Kisuke Urahara, who sent Hiyori to Squad Nine, volunteers to go to the scene of their disappearance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裏切り! 暗躍の藍染
Betrayal! Aizen`s Secret Maneuvers
Trahison ! La manœuvre secrète d`Aizen
Uragiri! Anyaku no Aizen
episode.summary: At Squad Nine`s camp, Shinji Hirako and the others run into Kensei Muguruma, who is donning a strange mask. Kensei starts to attack them, and he is too powerful to stop even with all of them combined. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 平子を救え! 藍染VS浦原
Rescue Hirako! Aizen vs. Urahara
Sauvetage d`Hirako ! Aizen contre Urahara
Hirako o Sukue! Aizen VS Urahara
episode.summary: Sosuke Aizen suddenly appears in front of Shinji Hirako and the others. He draws his sword on Shinji, who is agonized by his Hollow transformation and cannot move his body at will. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カラクライザー誕生
The Karakurizer is Born
Karakurizer: Konsô le justicier. La naissance du héros justicier
Karakurizer Tanjou
episode.summary: Ichigo and his friends leave Karakura Town with the intent of bringing Orihime back, and they continue fighting in Hueco Mundo. Nevertheless, Hollows continue to appear in the World of the Living. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カラクライザー最後の日
Karakuraizer`s Last Day
Karakurizer: Konsô le justicier. La cape super-utile
Karakuraizer Saigo no Hi
episode.summary: Kisuke Urahara has forced Kon to transform into Konso Cop Karakurizer. As Karakurizer, Kon has some powerful allies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空座町を護れ! 死神総登場
Defend Karakura Town! Entire Appearance of the Shinigami
Défendre Karakura ! L`entrée des Shinigamis
Karakurachou o Mamore! Shinigami Soutoujou
episode.summary: Sosuke Aizen brings Kaname Tosen, Gin Ichimaru, and the Espadas Stark, Barragan, and Halibel to the World of the Living on a mission to destroy Karakura Town. The Espadas stand before the Thirteen Court Guard Squads. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 精鋭! 四人の死神
Elite! The Four Shinigami
L`élite ! Les quatre Shinigamis
Seiei! Yonin no Shinigami
episode.summary: The Head Captain expected the battle to take place in Karakura Town, so he fights to keep it from being destroyed. He places pillars in four corners of the town to switch the real Karakura Town with a replica that was made in the Soul Society. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美しき戦士シャルロッテ
Beautiful Warrior Charlotte
Charlotte, le beau petit démon !
Utsukushiki Senshi Charlotte
episode.summary: Shuhei, Ikkaku, Yumichika, and Izuru start fighting against the Fracci贸nes that Barragan deployed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 吉良, 絶望の中での戦い
Kira, the Battle Within Despair
Le combat désespéré de Kira
Kira, Zetsubou no Naka de no Tatakai
episode.summary: Yumichika is trapped inside Chuhlhourne’s briar of darkness. Learning he cannot be seen from the outside world, Yumichika unveils his Zanpakuto’s true power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一角倒れる! 死神の危機
Ikkaku Falls! The Shinigami`s Crisis
Ikkaku tombe ! Instant critique pour les Shinigami
Ikkaku Taoreru! Shinigami no Kiki
episode.summary: Shuhei, Izuru, Yumichika, and Ikkaku fight to guard the four pillars used to switch the real Karakura Town with a fake one. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 檜佐木始解! その名は...
Hisagi`s Shikai! The Name is...
Le Shikai d`Hisagi ! Son nom est...
Hisagi Shikai! Sono Na wa...
episode.summary: Shuhei Hisagi battles Findorr Calius, who has increased his strength level equal to that of a squad lieutenant by shattering his own mask. Shuhei, overwhelmed by the enemy’s power, is forced to stay on the defensive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 驚異の肉体!ジオ解放
A Miraculous Body! Ggio Releases
Un corps surprenant ! Ggio libéré
Kyoui no Nikutai! Ggio Kaihou
episode.summary: Ggio, who released his Hollow power, is overpowering Soi Fon. Marechiyo Omaeda realizes that Soi Fon is in a dire situation and comes to help her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最凶タッグ!? 砕蜂 & 大前田
The Most Evil Tag!? Soi Fon & Oomaeda
La plus puissante des confrontations !? Soi Fon et Ômaeda
Saikyou Tag!? Soi Fon & Oomaeda
episode.summary: Soi Fon and Marechiyo Omaeda are to take on Ggio and Nirgge. Soi Fon confidently goes after Ggio, but Ggio puts up a good fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全面対決!死神VS十刃
The Full Showdown! Shinigami vs. Espada
Combat de force ! Shinigami contre Espada
Zenmen Taiketsu! Shinigami VS Espada
episode.summary: The Soul Reapers succeed in defending the four pillars from being destroyed, preventing the real Karakura Town from returning to the World of the Living. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘終結? 新たなる戦いへ!
Fierce Fighting Concludes? Towards a New Battle!
La fin du combat féroce ? Vers une nouvelle bataille !
Gekitou Shuuketsu? Arata Naru Tatakai e!
episode.summary: The Soul Reapers are defeated one after another at the hands of Ayon. Seeing this, Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto decides to get involved. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 副隊長全滅! 恐怖の妖獣
All Vice-Captains Annihilated! The Terrifying Demonic Beast
Les vice-capitaines annihilés ! Le terrifiant monstre diabolique
Fuku Taichou Zenmetsu! Kyoufu no Youjuu
episode.summary: Apache, Mila Rose, and Sun-Sun release their Resurrección forms. In addition, they combine their left arms to create a mysterious monster called Ayon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 3 VS 1の戦闘! ピンチの乱菊
3 vs. 1 Battle! Rangiku`s Crisis
Trois contre un ! La crise de Rangiku
3 VS 1 no Sentou! Pinch no Rangiku
episode.summary: Rangiku battles Halibel’s three Fracciónes, Apache, Mila Rose, and Sun-Sun. She attacks with her Haineko, but even that is not very effective against the three opponents. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワンダフル・エラー
Wonderful Error
Merveilleuse erreur
Wonderful Error
episode.summary: Mizuiro starts at Karakura First High School without any great expectations or ambitions. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 斬魄刀実体化
The Materialization of Zanpakutou
Un nouvel ennemi ! Le Zanpakutô matérialisé
Zanpakutou Jittaika
episode.summary: A mysterious man who calls himself "Muramasa" appears in the Seireitei to declare war against the Soul Reapers. Using his powers, Muramasa gives physical form to the Zanpakuto and liberates them from the captains and lieutenants of the 13 Court Guard Squads. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヅラ死神誕生!
The Rug Shinigami is Born!
Pleurs de l`âme ? La naissance d`un nouveau Shinigami !
Zura Shinigami Tanjou!
episode.summary: Ikkaku and Yumichika are sent after a Hollow that ran away to the World of the Living. They have no prearranged lodging, so they decide to stay at the Asano family house. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夏だ! 海だ! 水着祭!!
Summer! Sea! Swimsuit Festival!!
Été et mer ! Le festival des maillots de bain !
Natsu Da! Umi Da! Mizugi Matsuri!!
episode.summary: Rangiku and the members of the Women’s Soul Reaper Association take a relaxing trip to a beach in the World of the Living. All the women are excited about wearing bathing suits that they have picked out for the occasion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白哉, 桜と共に消ゆ
Byakuya, Disappearing With the Cherry Blossoms
Byakuya, disparaissant avec les fleurs de cerisier
Byakuya, Sakura to Tomo ni Kiyu
episode.summary: Having sustained severe injuries in battle, Rukia escapes to the World of the Living and is saved by Ichigo. A mysterious woman then arrives through the Senkaimon and proceeds to attack the two using the same Zanpakuto as Rukia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敵となった斬月
Zangetsu Becomes an Enemy
Zangetsu devient un ennemi
Teki to Natta Zangetsu
episode.summary: Muramasa appears before Ichigo and explains how he freed the Zanpakuto from the Soul Reapers, as well as gave them a physical form to exist. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 袖白雪vsルキア! 心の惑い
Sode no Shirayuki vs. Rukia! The Delusion of the Heart
Sode no Shirayuki contre Rukia ! L`illusion du cœur
Sode no Shirayuki vs Rukia! Kokoro no Madoi
episode.summary: After hearing that Byakuya has gone missing, Rukia returns to the Seireitei to search for her brother and in the process comes across Sodenoshirayuki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 放て! 新たなる月牙天衝
Release! The New Getsuga Tenshou
Libération ! Le nouveau Getsuga Tenshô
Hanate! Arata Naru Getsuga Tenshou
episode.summary: Ichigo has regained his Shikai and battles Muramasa. But Zangetsu, who has sided with Muramasa, steps in to fight Ichigo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! 檜佐木vs風死
Clash! Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
Clash ! Hisagi contre Kazeshini
Gekitotsu! Hisagi vs Kazeshini
episode.summary: Inside Ichigo`s mind, Muramasa meets Hollow Ichigo. Taking an interest in him, Muramasa attempts to manifest Hollow Ichigo like he did with Zangetsu, only to discover that his spell does not work on Hollow Ichigo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋次驚愕!? 2人の蛇尾丸
Renji Surprised?! The Two Zabimaru
Renji surpris !? Les deux Zabimaru
Renji Kyougaku!? Futari no Zabimaru
episode.summary: The Zanpakuto rebellion has left the Seireitei in a state of destruction with many Soul Reapers still missing, including Squad Six captain Byakuya Kuchiki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 目覚めよ氷輪丸!
The Awakening Hyourinmaru!
Le réveil de Hyôrinmaru ! Le combat acharné d`Hitsugaya
Mezameyo Hyourinmaru!
episode.summary: The battle of Rangiku and Momo versus Haineko and Tobiume heats up, as both sides try to outsmart their opponents. Elsewhere, captain Toshiro Hitsugaya has located his Zanpakuto Hyorinmaru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友情? 嫌悪? 灰猫 & 飛梅
Friendship? Hatred? Haineko & Tobiume
Amitié ? Haine ? Haineko et Tobiume
Yuujou? Ken`o? Haineko & Tobiume
episode.summary: Haineko and Tobiume, two Zanpakuto who do not get along, are walking through the woods when they spot Ichigo, who is in pursuit of Senbonzakura and Byakuya. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 砕蜂, 斬魄刀を包囲せよ
Soi Fon, Surrounding the Zanpakutou
Soi Fon, entourant le Zanpakutô
Soi Fon, Zanpakutou o Houi Seyo
episode.summary: Ichigo`s and Renji`s victories against their own Zanpakuto has proven that a Soul Reaper can reclaim his Zanpakuto by defeating it in battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 裏切りの白哉
Byakuya`s Betrayal
La trahison de Byakuya !
Uragiri no Byakuya
episode.summary: Results from Mayuri Kurotsuchi`s experiment using Marechiyo Omaeda`s Gegetsuburi show that a manifested Zanpakuto cannot revert to its original sword state when defeated by someone other than its master. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一騎打ち! 一護VS千本桜
One-to-One Fight! Ichigo vs. Senbonzakura
Duel ! Ichigo contre Senbonzakura !
Ikkiuchi! Ichigo VS Senbonzakura
episode.summary: The Soul Reapers find themselves in a tough battle against the manifested Zanpakuto, including Ichigo who is struggling against Senbonzakura. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死神 & 斬魄刀, 総出撃
Shinigami and Zanpakutou, Total Sortie
Shinigami et Zanpakutô, sortie totale
Shinigami & Zanpakutou, Sou Shutsugeki
episode.summary: At the Squad Six Barracks, Renji and Rukia are determined to know why Byakuya has betrayed the Soul Society to work with Muramasa. Their conversation is cut short by the arrival of the manifested Zanpakuto. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誇りのために! 白哉VS恋次
For the Sake of Pride! Byakuya vs. Renji
Pour la fierté ! Byakuya contre Renji
Hokori no Tame ni! Byakuya VS Renji
episode.summary: The Thirteen Court Guard Squads, particularly Renji and Rukia, are shocked by the news of Byakuya now supposedly working with Muramasa. Meanwhile, inside Muramasa`s hideout, the Zanpakuto cannot hide their discomfort over having Byakuya join them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 満を持して... 剣八登場!
The Long Awaited... Kenpachi Appears!
L`homme tant attendu... Kenpachi apparaît !
Man o Jishite... Kenpachi Toujou!
episode.summary: The battle between Soul Reapers and Zanpakuto heats up as Kenpachi joins in the fight. Kenpachi easily overwhelms the Zanpakuto with his incredible Spirit Energy and then goes off to challenge Byakuya. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白哉を追え! 混乱の護廷隊
Pursue Byakuya! The Confused Gotei Divisions
Il faut poursuivre Byakuya ! Confusion dans le Gotei 13
Byakuya o Oe! Konran no Gotei Tai
episode.summary: Ichigo, Renji, Rukia, and Izuru collapse after being exposed to Konjiki Ashisogijizo`s poison. Konjiki Ashisogijizo then seeks for its next prey but is stopped by Yachiru Kusajishi. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千本桜卍解! 現世の攻防
Senbonzakura`s Bankai! Offense and Defense of the Living World
Le Bankai de Senbonzakura ! La bataille du monde des vivants
Senbonzakura Bankai! Gensei no Koubou
episode.summary: Uryu, Chad, and Orihime confront Muramasa who has entered the World of the Living. Using teamwork, Uryu and Chad at first appear to gain the upper hand in battle, when Senbonzakura appears to assist Muramasa. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 氷の龍と炎の龍! 最強対決!
Dragon of Ice and Dragon of Flame! The Strongest Showdown!
Dragon de glace et dragon de feu ! La confrontation des plus puissants !
Koori no Ryuu to Honoo no Ryuu! Saikyou Taiketsu!
episode.summary: Muramasa`s true objective is revealed to be in Karakura Town. Ichigo and the other Soul Reapers try to go after Muramasa, but the manifested Zanpakuto of Genryusai`s Ryujinjakka stands in their way. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 騙された死神! 世界崩壊の危機
Deceived Shinigami! The World Collapse Crisis
Les Shinigamis dupés ! La crise d`un monde qui s`effondre
Damasareta Shinigami! Sekai Houkai no Kiki
episode.summary: Ichigo battles Muramasa in order to save Head Captain Yamamoto from captivity. Meanwhile, Yoruichi, Shunsui, and Jushiro notice that the Zanpakuto are trying to prevent them from reaching Ichigo, and quickly realize that he was the key to Muramasa`s plan all along. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特務! 山本総隊長を救出せよ!
Special Mission! Rescue Captain-Commander Yamamoto!
Mission spéciale ! À la rescousse du capitaine-commandant Yamamoto !
Tokumu! Yamamoto Sou Taichou o Kyuushutsu Seyo!
episode.summary: Yoruichi has located Muramasa`s hideout where Head Captain Yamamoto is being held. A team comprised of Ichigo, Shunsui, Jushiro, Kenpachi, and Yoruichi sets out to rescue the Head Captain, but the group soon encounters the Zanpakuto who were anticipating their arrival. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇の歴史! 最凶の死神, 誕生
Dark History! The Worst Shinigami is Born
Histoire obscure ! Le plus mauvais Shinigami nait
Yami no Rekishi! Saikyou no Shinigami, Tanjou
episode.summary: Koga Kuchiki escapes his confinement and in the process, kills the Soul Reapers who framed him. Although Ginrei sympathizes with his son-in-law`s situation, he reprimands Koga for his rash actions. Enraged, Koga severs his ties with the Kuchiki clan and begins killing Soul Reapers and innocent people. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: その男・朽木家ゆえに
That Man, For the Sake of the Kuchiki
Cet homme, pour le bien des Kuchiki
Sono Otoko, Kuchiki-Ke Yue ni
episode.summary: Centuries ago, Ginrei Kuchiki, Byakuya Kuchiki`s grandfather, and his son-in-law Koga Kuchiki were assigned to bring down the rebel forces threatening the Seireitei. With his Zanpakuto Muramasa`s power, Koga wipes out the renegade Soul Reapers one after another, and soon his strength becomes known throughout the Soul Society. Yet Koga himself was frustrated by the fact that his father-in-law Ginrei did not seem to acknowledge his accomplishments. See More Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白哉, 裏切りに隠された真実
Byakuya, the Truth Behind his Betrayal
Byakuya, la vérité sur sa trahison
Byakuya, Uragiri ni Kakusareta Shinjitsu
episode.summary: To uphold the honor of his family, Byakuya Kuchiki fights the resurrected Koga Kuchiki. Meanwhile, the despair of being abandoned by Koga takes its toll on Muramasa`s body. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 明かされた村正の正体
Muramasa`s True Identity Revealed
La vraie identité de Muramasa est révélée
Akasareta Muramasa no Shoutai
episode.summary: Koga`s betrayal causes Muramasa to lose control over all of the Hollows he absorbed to sustain himself. To make matters worse, his immense Spiritual Pressure begins to attract other Hollows to Karakura Town. As Ichigo, Uryu, Chad, Orihime, and Rukia work together to deal with the situation, Muramasa fires a massive Cero towards them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 終章・斬魄刀異聞篇
Final Chapter Zanpakuto Unknown Tales
Chapitre final : Les histoires inconnues des Zanpakutô
Owari, Zanpakutou Ibun Hen
episode.summary: Inside Muramasa`s mind, Ichigo clashes blades with Muramasa. As Muramasa`s body and mind reach their limits, he begins to transform into a Hollow. With little time remaining, Ichigo and Muramasa decide to settle their score once and for all. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白哉と恋次, 六番隊再び
Byakuya and Renji, the 6th Division Returns
Byakuya et Renji, de retour dans la sixième division
Byakuya to Renji, Roku Ban Tai Futatabi
episode.summary: Uryu and the others attempt to save Ichigo, who has been engulfed by Muramasa, but with little success. Meanwhile, the Soul Reapers of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads team up with their own Zanpakuto to fight the Hollows that have appeared in the World of the Living. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たな敵! 刀獣の正体
A New Enemy! The True Nature of the Beast Swords
Un nouvel ennemi ! La vraie nature des épées bestiales
Arata na Teki! Toujuu no Shoutai
episode.summary: The assailants who attacked the Kuchiki mansion are identified as "Sword Beasts," manifested Zanpakuto of Soul Reapers who lost their lives during the battle with Muramasa. Due to the potential danger, an order is issued throughout the Soul Society to hunt down all remaining Sword Beasts, including ones who have escaped into the World of the Living. Toshiro, Hyorinmaru, Rangiku, and Haineko go after a Sword Beast who is in the World of the Living searching for its master. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怒りの白哉! 朽木家崩壊
Byakuya`s Anger! The Kuchiki Family Collapses
La colère de Byakuya ! La chute de la famille Kuchiki
Ikari no Byakuya! Kuchikike Houkai
episode.summary: With the defeat of Muramasa, peace has returned to the Soul Society. Renji, Rukia, and the other Soul Reapers are having a good time at the Kuchiki mansion`s party, when the place is suddenly attacked by two unknown beings. Having left her Zanpakuto behind, Rukia falls into danger when, to her surprise, the manifested Sodenoshirayuki comes to her rescue. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迷子の蛇, 受難の猿
Stray Snake, Tortured Monkey
Serpent errant, singe torturé
Maigo no Hebi, Junan no Saru
episode.summary: Renji and Zabimaru (Monkey and Snake) come to the World of the Living to go after a Sword Beast. However, Snake is too distracted by his surroundings, and as a result lets the Sword Beast escape. After being scolded by Renji and Monkey, a frustrated Snake decides he wants to be his own man and runs off. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖! 地下に潜む怪物
Terror! The Monster That Lurks Underground
Terreur ! Le monstre qui se cache sous terre
Kyoufu! Chika ni Hisomu Kaibutsu
episode.summary: Isane and Hanataro are troubled by the recent reports of someone stealing food from the Squad Four barracks. Evidence shows that the thief is hiding in an underground waterway, and so a team comprised of Hanataro, Nanao, Ikkaku, and Hozukimaru is sent down for investigation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未知なる能力者! 狙われた織姫
The Person with the Unknown Ability! Orihime is Targeted
La personne aux capacités inconnues ! Orihime est prise pour cible
Michi naru Nouryokusha! Nerawareta Orihime
episode.summary: Karakura Town has been experiencing a string of assaults, and the victims have all been reported to be high school girls carrying a pink bear charm. Meanwhile, a new girl transfers into Orihime`s class and introduces herself as Kyoko Haida. When Orihime accidentally exposes her powers before Kyoko, the new girl takes an interest in her, claiming she is worthy to become her friend. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決着!? 檜佐木VS風死
Conclusion?! Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
Conclusion !? Hisagi contre Kazeshini !
Kecchaku!? Hisagi VS Kazeshini
episode.summary: Following Muramasa`s defeat, most of the Zanpakuto have reconciled and returned to their masters, except for Kazeshini, who is still out to kill his former master Shuhei Hisagi. When Kazeshini goes into the Rukon District in the hopes of finding Shuhei, he instead comes across an infant who just lost his father to a Sword Beast. To Kazeshini`s annoyance, the infant has taken a liking to the rogue Zanpakuto and now refuses to leave his side. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悲劇の刀獣! 灰猫, 号泣!
The Tragic Sword Fiend! Haineko Cries!
Haineko crie ! Les tragiques épées bestiales
Higeki no Toujuu! Haineko, Goukyuu!
episode.summary: During a mission to hunt down the Sword Beasts, Haineko comes across a wounded Sword Beast called Narunosuke and, to her surprise, falls in love with the handsome enemy before her. Believing that Narunosuke is different from other Sword Beasts, Haineko goes against her orders and decides to look after him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 進化!? 最後の刀獣の脅威!
Progress!? The Last Sword Fiend Threat!
Évolution ?! La merveille du final des épées bestiales
Shinka!? Saigo no Toujuu no Kyoui!
episode.summary: The Zanpakuto notice the remaining Sword Beasts acting strangely and realize it to be the work of Kirikaze, a Sword Beast capable of robbing Spirit Energy from others. With their time to manifest as physical entities reaching its limits, the Zanpakuto are determined to carry out their last mission to defeat Kirikaze. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女の戦い? 花天狂骨VS七緒!
Women`s Fight? Katenkyoukotsu vs Nanao!
Bataille de femmes ? Nanao contre Katen Kyôkotsu !
Onna no Tatakai? Katenkyoukotsu VS Nanao!
episode.summary: Lieutenant Nanao Ise is paired up with Katenkyokotsu Wakizashi, the shorter of Captain Kyoraku`s two swords, to hunt for Sword Beasts. But Nanao finds Wakizashi`s malicious and distrustful nature to be quite difficult to work with. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幽閉!? 千本桜&蛇尾丸
Confinement!? Senbonzakura and Zabimaru
Emprisonnement ?! Senbonzakura et Zabimaru
Yuuhei!? Senbonzakura & Zabimaru
episode.summary: Renji`s Zanpakuto Zabimaru, consisting of Monkey and Snake, are irritated over the fact that Byakuya`s Senbonzakura is taking all the credit for their work. Later, a small accident leads to the three Zanpakuto becoming trapped inside the Department of Research and Development`s facility. As they try to find a means to escape, the two Zabimarus find Senbonzakura to be more troublesome than either of them had anticipated. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 嫉妬と憎悪... 窮地の織姫!
Jealousy and Hatred... Orihime`s Dilemma
Haine et jalousie, le dilemme d`Orihime
Shitto to Zouo... Kyuuchi no Orihime!
episode.summary: While Orihime is watching Ichigo and Ulquiorra’s battle from the sidelines, Loly and Menoly appear before her. They learned that Orihime is no longer of any use to Aizen, and they want to seize this opportunity to defeat her. Orihime has no means to fight back, and she gets hurt left and right. When Ichigo notices this, he tries to go rescue her, but Ulquiorra keeps getting in his way, and he is unable to get anywhere near Orihime. Amidst the chaos, a new enemy breaks through the floor of the Fifth Tower and appears before Ichigo and the others. The new enemy is none other than Yammy who came to assist Ulquiorra. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 繋がる心! 決死の左拳!
Connected Hearts! The Left Fist Prepared for Death!
Les cœurs connectés. Le poing gauche préparé à la mort
Tsunagaru Kokoro! Kesshi no Hidari Koushi!
episode.summary: Below the Fifth Tower, Sado and Renji battle it out with a giant Hollow. But then, the sandman Batticaloa arrives to the scene. Batticaloa’s body is made of sand, so Sado and Renji have a hard time inflicting any damage on him. And Rukia, whose ice-snow Zanpakuto is the sole weapon that can contend with Batticaloa, is struggling in another battle against Rudobon. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Ulquiorra are still battling when Ichigo learns that Orihime has already been converted to Ulquiorra’s side. Ichigo pretends it doesn’t concern him, but he can’t hide his distress. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護VSウルキオラ, 再開!
Ichigo Vs Ulquiorra, Restart!
Ichigo contre Ulquiorra, réouverture
Ichigo VS Ulquiorra, Saikai!
episode.summary: Aizen leads Tosen, Gin, and the Espadas as they invade the World of the Living. Aizen’s real objective is to annihilate Karakura Town to create Ouken, the royal key and take the Soul Society by storm. The Soul Reapers anticipate this and prepare for battle. Meanwhile, Ichigo gets on his way to save Orihime from the Fifth Tower where she is being held captive. And then, Ichigo and Ulquiorra’s fated showdown finally begins! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護と雨竜(うりゅう), 背中合わせの絆!
Ichigo and Uryuu, Back to Back Bonds!
Ichigo et Uryû, liés dos à dos
Ichigo to Uryuu, Senaka Awase no Kizuna!
episode.summary: Uryu rushes to stop Yammy from attacking Orihime. Ichigo is surprised, but Uryu charges at Yammy without hesitation. Uryu notices that Ichigo, concerned about Orihime, was not using the power of his Hollowfication, and Uryu was trying to get the fight with Yammy over with as quickly as possible. However, Yammy’s body is tough, and every attack from Ginreikojaku’s arrow and Seeleschneider is repelled. Yammy triumphantly brings out a giant Cero on them. Just when they thought it couldn’t get any worse… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護死す! 織姫, 悲痛の叫び!
Ichigo Dies! Orihime, the Cry of Sorrow!
Ichigo meurt. Orihime, les pleurs de tristesse
Ichigo Shisu! Orihime, Hitsuu no Sakebi!
episode.summary: When Orihime and Uryu make it to the top of the dome, they see Ichigo collapsed in front of Ulquiorra. Orihime’s reaction is to rush over to Ichigo, but Ulquiorra tells her that it’s no use. Just then, Uryu hits Ulquiorra with his arrow. But like all of Ichigo’s attacks, Uryu’s arrow is ineffective against Ulquiorra. Ulquiorra attacks back and Uryu is no longer able to even draw his bow. Distressed by the situation, Orihime calls out to the immobile Ichigo for help. Then something happens to Ichigo’s body…. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶望の始まり... 一護, 届かぬ刃
Beginning of Despair... Ichigo, the Unreachable Blade
Les prémices du désespoir... Ichigo, la lame inaccessible
Zetsubou no Hajimari... Ichigo, Todokanu Yaiba
episode.summary: Ulquiorra’s sword release, Murcielago, is too strong for Ichigo and every swift attack further injures him. Even when he fires Getsugatensho with all of his remaining power, Ichigo is unable to wound Ulquiorra. In spite of that, Ichigo continues to attack Ulquiorra in order to save Orihime and go back with his friends. But Ulquiorra tries to show off his Resurreccion Segunda Etapa. Meanwhile, Orihime and Uryu are worried about Ichigo as they head to the top of the dome… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 日番谷, 捨て身の氷天百華葬[ひょうてんひゃっかそう]!
Hitsugaya, the Suicidal Frozen Heavens Hundred Flowers Funeral!
Hitsugaya, les funérailles des 1000 fleurs du paradis de glace
Hitsugaya, Sutemi no Hyoutenhyakkasou!
episode.summary: Hitsugaya is doing everything he can to counter Halibel’s sword release, Tiburon. Halibel says she will win against Hitsugaya to avenge her Fracciónes. She melts the ice with Hirviendo and drives Hitsugaya into a corner. Hitsugaya counters by turning Halibel’s water attack into ice with his Zanpakuto, Hyorinmaru, but Halibel has other tricks up her sleeve… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鮫の猛威! ハリベル解放
Fury of a Shark! Halibel Releases
La furie du requin, Hallibel se libère
Same no Moui! Halibel Kaihou
episode.summary: Rukia, Renji, and Sado struggle against the giant Yammy. However, when they see Yammy’s tattoo of the number “10”, they realize that he is weaker than the Espadas they’ve fought in the past. Each one of them tries to go after Yammy, but Yammy releases his sword, Ira , which overwhelms them. Meanwhile, in Karakura Town, the battle between the Soul Reapers and the Espada, led by Aizen, intensifies. Halibel attacks Hitsugaya, who achieves Bankai and counterattacks, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護vsウルキオラ, 決着!
Ichigo Vs Ulquiorra, Conclusion!
Ichigo contre Ulquiorra, conclusion
Ichigo vs Ulquiorra, Kecchaku!
episode.summary: Rukia, Renji, and Sado are battling Rudobon and the soldiers he created. But then, another enemy appears before them. It is Yammy, who fell off of the Fifth Tower. The three of them are surprised that Yammy has transformed into a giant. In the meantime, on top of the dome, a Hollowfied Ichigo is fighting Ulquiorra. When Uryu tries to stop Ichigo… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白熱! 京楽vsスターク!
Climax! Kyouraku Vs Starrk!
Paroxysme. Kyoraku contre Starrk
Hakunetsu! Kyouraku vs Starrk!
episode.summary: Kyoraku and Stark are both fighting defensively in their battle. But Stark’s expression changes when he spots Hitsugaya and Soi Fon’s Bankai. Kyoraku leaves his haori with Ukitake to confront Stark. Stark calls Lilinette over, and tells everyone that the two of them used to be one person. Stark then releases his Resurrección and takes on the form of Los Lobos. Kyoraku achieves Shikai and they continue to fight for real! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一撃決殺! 砕蜂, 卍解!
One Hit Kill! Soi Fon, Bankai!
La mort en un coup, le Bankai de Soi Fon
Ichigeki Kessatsu! Soi Fon, Bankai!
episode.summary: The battle between the Soul Reapers and the Espada becomes more and more tense. Soi Fon and Omaeda find themselves in a bad situation against Barragan’s Respira. They can’t even counterattack Respira because they can’t get anywhere near it. Then, Soi Fon goes off somewhere, leaving Omaeda to fight Barragan alone. Omaeda attacks with Gegetsuburi, but Barragan destroys it easily with Respira. Just when Omaeda is backed into a corner, Soi Fon arrives, having released her Bankai… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迫る死の息吹... 死を司る王!
The Approaching Breath of Death... the King Who Rules Over Death!
Le souffle de la mort approche, le roi qui règne sur la mort
Semaru Shi no Ibuki... Shi o Tsukasadoru Ou!
episode.summary: While Hitsugaya and Halibel’s battle looks to be coming to a close, Omaeda and Soi Fon fight against Barragan. Just when Soi Fon is about to attack Barragan, Soi Fon suddenly becomes sluggish. Soi Fon is baffled, and Barragan tells her that he has the power to age people. Barragan only has to will old age upon his opponent and touch that person for the opponent to immediately grow old and die. Soi Fon now understands the severity of this power, but she has already been touched by Barragan… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪夢再び... 復活の十刃
The Nightmare Returns... Revival of the Espada
Le cauchemar revient... La résurrection de l`Espada
Akumu Futatabi... Fukkatsu no Espada
episode.summary: Kyoraku is in a pinch, and Ukitake, who had been watching the battle, steps in. Ukitake fires Cero at Stark, even though it is a technique that Soul Reapers shouldn’t be able to use. Stark is surprised, but he quickly recovers from the shock and shoots something back at him. Then, all of a sudden, Garganta starts to open to reveal the creepy Wonderweiss and Fura. All of the Soul Reapers are exhausted from battling, and they are in no state to face a new opponent… Source: crunchyroll
