檜佐木と東仙... 訣別の時!
Hisagi and Tousen, the Moment of Parting
Hisagi et Tosen, le moment de la séparation
Hisagi to Tousen... Ketsubetsu no Toki!
episode.summary: Hisagi joins Komamura to battle Tosen in hopes of bringing his former captain back to his senses. Meanwhile the other Soul Reapers form an uneasy alliance with the Visoreds: Lisa, Hiyori, and Hitsugaya take on Halibel. Love and Rose take on Stark. Hachi, Omaeda, and Soi Fon take on Barragan. The battle against the Espada resumes! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魂の力! 群狼, 襲来!
Power of the Soul! The Wolves, Attack!
Le pouvoir de l`âme. L`attaque des loups
Tamashii no Chikara! Los Lobos, Shuurai!
episode.summary: Stark shows no sign of getting serious in his battle against Love and Rose. Running out of patience, Lilinette begins to mindlessly fire at the two Visoreds without Stark’s permission. But her attacks prove to be ineffective against the two, and she is gradually cornered by the pair’s fine team play. Finally, Love hits Stark with his Zanpakuto attack, and the Espada is thrown into a sea of flames. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 偽りの王冠, バラガンの怨恨
Crown of Lies, Baragan`s Grudge
Couronne des mensonges, la rancœur de Barragan
Itsuwari no Oukan, Baragan no Enkon
episode.summary: Barragan appears to be defeated by the combined efforts of Hachigen and Soi Fon. But the two are shocked to find Barragan forcing open Hachigen’s Shiju Saimon barrier. As king of Hueco Mundo, Barragan is determined to show the world his absolute strength and power. His reason originates as far back to when he once reigned over his subjects in Las Noches. Having no enemies to conquer, Barragan would pit his subjects against one another to fight off his boredom. That was when Aizen arrived in Hueco Mundo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 平子と藍染... 因縁の再会!
Hirako and Aizen... the Reunion of Fate!
Hirako et Aizen... La réunion du destin
Hirako to Aizen... Innen no Saikai!
episode.summary: The Soul Reapers find themselves in hot water against Fura and Wonderweiss when the Visoreds, led by Shinji Hirako, make their appearance. Used in Aizen’s Hollowfication experiment 101 years ago, the Visoreds have since lived in hiding in the World of the Living. Believing that now is the time to defeat Aizen, the Visoreds have set foot on the battlefield. Recognizing familiar faces, both Visoreds and Soul Reapers exchange words with one another. Wonderweiss disrupts the scene by signaling Fura to release hordes of Menos… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 正義の為に?! 死神を捨てた男
For the Sake of Justice?! The Man Who Deserted the Shinigami
Pour l`amour de la justice. L`homme qui a déserté les Shinigami
Seigi no Tame ni?! Shinigami o Suteta Otoko
episode.summary: Komamura performs his Bankai, Kokujo Tengen Myo-oh, to subdue Tosen. However, Tosen has already deduced the weakness of Komamura’s Bankai from years of working closely together. Despite the damage received, Komamura refuses to give up on his former friend, throwing out the question of why Tosen chose to become a Soul Reaper in the first place. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白哉VS剣八?! 乱戦開始
Byakuya vs. Kenpachi?! The Melee Commences
Byakuya contre Kenpachi. La mêlée commence
Byakuya VS Kenpachi?! Ransen Kaishi
episode.summary: As he holds a dying Hiyori, an enraged Hirako readies himself to confront Aizen in battle. Meanwhile, Hisagi and Komamura battle Tosen in a desperate attempt to bring their former ally back to his senses. But Tosen, who believes he follows a just path, ignores their plea and attacks them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の切り札! 一護, 決戦へ
The Final Trump Card! Ichigo, Towards the Decisive Battle
L`atout final. Ichigo, vers la bataille décisive
Saigo no Kirifuda! Ichigo, Kessen e
episode.summary: Kenpachi overcomes Yammy’s monstrous size and tough exterior to land a clean blow against the Espada. Meanwhile, Ichigo uses Garganta to return to the World of the Living. On the way, Captain Unohana explains to Ichigo about Aizen’s power of “Complete Hypnosis.” She then reveals that Ichigo is the key to defeating Aizen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 外伝! 一護と魔法のランプ
Side Story! Ichigo and the Magic Lamp
Chronique. Ichigo et la lampe magique
Gaiden! Ichigo to Mahou no Lamp
episode.summary: Ichigo wakes up to find himself in the middle of a desert. Sitting next to a confused Ichigo are Uryu, Orihime, and Chad, all dressed in an Arabian style. Introducing themselves as “Urio,” “Ori Mei,” and “Chaido,” the three explain that they are in search of a treasure called the “Snow Crystal.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護の帰還! 空座町を護れ
Ichigo`s Return! Protect Karakura Town
Protéger Karakura. Ichigo, vers le monde réel
Ichigo no Kikan! Karakurachou o Mamore
episode.summary: Ichigo goes up against Yammy. Rukia notices that Ichigo is acting strange following his battle with Ulquiorra and shows her concern for him. Ichigo is also shaken up by the fact that his Hollowfication now feels different. But, unable to forgive Yammy for labeling Ulquiorra and Grimmjow as trash, Ichigo makes another attempt at his Hollowfication. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 百年の怨恨! ひよ里の復讐
The Hundred-Year Grudge! Hiyori`s Revenge
Cent ans de rancune. La vengeance de Hiyori
Hyakunen no Enkon! Hiyori no Fukushuu
episode.summary: With the Espada gone, the Visoreds are now able to confront Aizen. Having been unwilling test subjects in Aizen’s past experiment, the Visoreds make no effort to hide their hatred toward the man who destroyed their lives. Hiyori, unable hold in her anger, is the first to attack Aizen with her blade. Meanwhile, Chad, Renji, and Rukia continue their fight against Yammy in Hueco Mundo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 犠牲の連鎖, ハリベルの過去
Chain of Sacrifice, Harribel`s Past
Chaîne de sacrifice, le passé de Hallibel
Gisei no Rensa, Harribel no Kako
episode.summary: Las Noches. Long ago, Apache, at the time still an Adjucha-class Hollow, was hunted by other Hollows when Halibel saved her life. Apache soon joins Halibel’s group consisting of Sun-Sun and Mila Rose. As they spend more time together, Apache notices Halibel does not devour the enemies she defeats. When questioned, Halibel responds that she does not wish to become stronger by sacrificing others. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スターク, たった独りの戦い
Starrk, the Lone Battle
Stark, le combat solitaire
Starrk, Tatta Hitori no Tatakai
episode.summary: Stark splits his own soul and shapes it into packs of wolves and launches them against Love and Rose. Preparing to deliver the finishing blow, Stark is caught off guard by Shunsui, who suddenly appears out of Stark’s shadow. Despite his best efforts to dodge the attacks, Stark is gradually weakened. Just then the wolves, headed by Lilinette, swarm over Shunsui. He brushes them off, and the wolves disappear. Stark calls out for Lilinette but hears no reply. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 24
藍染との死闘! 平子, 始解!
Desperate Struggle with Aizen! Hirako, Shikai!
Lutte désesperée contre Aizen. Le Shikai d`Hirako
Aizen to no Shitou! Hirako, Shikai!
episode.summary: Tosen is now able to see in his Ressureccion form. But Komamura states that in exchange for his vision, Tosen has now blinded his own heart. Unable to bring himself to kill the man he wanted to save, Komamura falls before Tosen’s attack. Meanwhile, Hirako prepares to use his Shikai, Sakanade, against Aizen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 封印された元柳斎!
The Sealed Genryuusai!
Impossible d`attaquer. Genryûsai scellé
Fuuinsareta Genryuusai!
episode.summary: Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads steps in to battle Aizen. Genryusai’s attempt to incinerate Aizen in a blazing inferno is thwarted by Wonderweiss, whose Ressureccion form extinguishes the flames. Wonderweiss is revealed to be a Mod Arrancar created by Aizen for the sole purpose of sealing away Genryusai’s zanpakuto, Ryujinjakka. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 日番谷, 激昂! 憎しみの刃!
Hitsugaya, Enraged! Blade of Hatred!
Lame de la haine. La colère d`Hitsugaya
Hitsugaya, Gekkou! Nikushimi no Yaiba!
episode.summary: The Thirteen Court Guard Squads and Visoreds launch a full-scale attack against Aizen. But Aizen makes quick work of their combined efforts. Just when all hope is thought to be lost, Hirako uses his Zanpakuto’s power to draw away Aizen’s attention, giving way for Hitsugaya to deliver the killing blow. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全面戦争! 藍染VS死神!
All Out War! Aizen vs. Shinigami!
Guerre totale. Aizen contre Shinigami
Zenmen Sensou! Aizen VS Shinigami!
episode.summary: Ichigo has returned to the World of the Living to battle Aizen. After an unsuccessful first attack, Ichigo Hollowfies to deliver his Getsugatensho against Aizen, but that too proves ineffective. Witnessing the immense power Aizen holds, Ichigo begins to lose his will to fight, when the Thirteen Court Guard Squads stand up to support him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 25
Opening 13
衝撃の真実... 一護に秘められた力!
The Shocking Truth...The Mysterious Power Within Ichigo!
La choquante vérité... Le mystérieux pouvoir intérieur d`Ichigo
Shougeki no Shinjitsu... Ichigo ni Himerareta Chikara!
episode.summary: Aizen’s revelation that Ichigo is his greatest research subject throws Ichigo into a state of shock. But before Aizen can reveal Ichigo’s most startling secret he is interrupted by an unexpected person arriving on the scene. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全ては罠... 仕組まれた絆!
It`s All a Trap... Engineered Bonds!
Tout n`est qu`un piège... Liens réalisés
Subete wa Wana... Shikumareta Kizuna!
episode.summary: Ichigo succeeds in wounding Aizen with his Hollowfied Getsugatensho attack. But to his surprise, the Hogyoku instantly heals Aizen’s wound. Aizen then reveals an even more shocking truth to Ichigo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 浦原登場! 藍染を阻止せよ!
Urahara Appears! Stop Aizen!
Urahara apparaît. Stopper Aizen
Urahara Toujou! Aizen o Soshi Seyo!
episode.summary: Kisuke Urahara steps onto the battlefield as Aizen, fused with the Hogyoku, begins his transformation. Urahara’s Kido attack appears ineffective against Aizen, who claims he has complete control over the Hogyoku. But Urahara’s true goal was to turn Aizen’s own spirit energy against himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 劇場公開記念! 地獄編・序章
Theatre Opening Commemoration! Hell Chapter: Prologue
Cérémonie d`ouverture. Chapitre des enfers : Prologue
Gekijou Koukai Kinen! Jigoku Hen: Joshou
episode.summary: While visiting the World of the Living, Rukia comes across Kurumadani, the current Soul Reaper stationed in Karakura Town, being attacked by a mysterious masked man. To her surprise, the masked man reveals himself as Shrieker, the Hollow previously defeated and sent to hell by Rukia and Chad. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 映画だ! 祭りだ! 死神映画祭!
Film! Festival! Shinigami Film Festival!
Le film des Shinigamis
Eiga Da! Matsuri Da! Shinigami Eigasai!
episode.summary: A Seireitei International Film Festival is to be held in the Soul Society, and Nanao recruits Ichigo and his friends to cooperate with the filming. The crew consists of Rukia in the lead role, Renji as the director, Uryu as the costume designer, with Rangiku, Orihime, and Chad as supporting cast members. Will these guys really be able complete the film and win the award for best film?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伸びる刃!? 一護VSギン!
The Extending Blade?! Ichigo vs. Gin!
Extension de la lame. Ichigo contre Gin
Nobiru Yaiba!? Ichigo VS Gin!
episode.summary: As they cross blades, Gin asks Ichigo if he recalls their last encounter, to which Ichigo responds he does not remember Gin’s “heart” being present back then. Ichigo’s answer prompts Gin to display his Bankai and its incredible power. Meanwhile, Isshin notices a change occurring within Aizen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 現世も死神も! お正月スペシャル!
Real World and Shinigami! The New Year Special!
Le monde réel et les Shinigamis. Épisode spécial nouvel an
Gensei mo Shinigami mo! Oshougatsu Special!
episode.summary: The Women’s Soul Reaper Association is hosting a New Year’s party in the Soul Society, when Hitsugaya and the other male Soul Reapers come crashing in. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, everyone is spending New Year’s with their families. Orihime, who has no family, spends her time alone, when Rukia and Renji come by to say their New Year’s greeting. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の月牙天衝!? 一護の修行!
The Final Getsuga Tenshou!? Ichigo`s Training!
L`ultime Getsuga Tenshô. L`entraînement d`Ichigo
Saigo no Getsuga Tenshou!? Ichigo no Shugyou!
episode.summary: While going after Aizen, who has left for Karakura Town, Ichigo and Isshin arrive in the Precipice World, a place where time flows two thousand times slower than the outside world. Isshin decides to use this opportunity to have Ichigo acquire the “Final Getsugatensho,” which could defeat Aizen. Meanwhile, at the Karakura Town relocated to the Soul Society, Keigo and Tatsuki wake up to realize something terrible is happening to their town. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護, 戦意喪失!? ギンの思惑!
Ichigo Loses His Fighting Spirit!? Gin`s Expectation!
Ichigo perd son esprit combatif. La prédiction de Gin
Ichigon Sen`isoushitsu!? Gin no Omowaku!
episode.summary: Ichigo finds himself cornered against Gin’s Bankai. But to Ichigo’s surprise, Gin advises him to run from this battle. Meanwhile, Urahara, Yoruichi, and Isshin fight Aizen in a three-on-one battle. But none of their attacks appear to work against Aizen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 外伝再び! 今度の敵はモンスター!?
Another Side Story! This Time the Enemy Is a Monster!?
Une autre chronique. Cette fois l`ennemi est un vrai monstre
Gaiden Futatabi! Kondo no Teki wa Monster!?
episode.summary: Two monster hunters arrive at an old castle where Franken Ichigo, Succubus Rukia, Vampire Uryu, Pumpkin Orihime, Mummy Renji, Witch Rangiku, and Wolfman Hitsugaya all live as lackluster monsters. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さよなら... 乱菊
Goodbye... Rangiku
Adieu... Rangiku
Sayonara... Rangiku
episode.summary: Gin recalls his past and the fateful event that led him to become a Soul Reaper serving under Aizen. Meanwhile, Aizen’s overwhelming Spiritual Pressure forces Tatsuki, Keigo and the others to fall helplessly to the ground, when Ichigo finally arrives after completing his training. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 緊急事態! 藍染, 更なる進化!
Emergency Situation! Aizen, New Evolution!
Situation urgente. La nouvelle évolution d`Aizen
Kinkyuujidai! Aizen, Sara Naru Shinka!
episode.summary: Aizen continues his pursuit of Ichigo’s friends. Fearing for their lives, Keigo attempts to attack Aizen using the Zanpakuto he stole from Kurumadani. Gin returns to Aizen after having personally dealt with Rangiku, and his appearance prompts Tatsuki and the others to prepare for the worst. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 護(まも)るために! 一護vs天鎖斬月!
For the Sake of Protecting! Ichigo Vs. Tensa Zangetsu!
Protéger Ichigo contre Tensa Zangetsu
Mamoru Tame ni! Ichigo vs Tensa Zangetsu!
episode.summary: Aizen and Gin close in on Tatsuki, when Don Kanonji comes to the rescue. A still-injured Rangiku also arrives to confront Gin. Meanwhile, seeking to learn the Final Getsugatensho, Ichigo battles Tensa Zangetsu and Hollow Ichigo, who have now merged into one being. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妄想爆走! 檜佐木(ひさぎ), 温泉旅館へ!
Delusion Roars! Hisagi, Towards the Hot Springs Inn!
Cris illusoires. Hisagi à l`auberge des sources chaudes
Bousou Bakusou! Hisagi, Onsen Ryokan e!
episode.summary: Shuhei Hisagi leads a busy life handling the duties of Squad 9 Lieutenant and Editor in Chief of the Seireitei Bulletin, as well as preparing picnic lunches for the Soul Reapers. One day, Hisagi and Rangiku are sent to investigate a string of disappearances in the Rukon district. But being alone together with Rangiku causes Hisagi’s imagination to go wild, which worsens when Rangiku suggests spending the night at an inn. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 26
一護の覚悟! 激闘の代償
Ichigo`s Resolution! The Price of the Fierce Battle
La résolution d`Ichigo. Le prix de la bataille féroce
Ichigo no Kakugo! Gekitou no Daishou
episode.summary: The battle in Karakura Town and the Soul Society has come to an end. Karakura Town is returned to the World of the Living using Mayuri’s technology, and everyone prepares to return to their respective places. Ichigo is reunited with his friends who have returned from Hueco Mundo, when his condition suddenly changes. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘決着! 放て, 最後の月牙天衝!
Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Release, the Final Getsuga Tensho!
La confrontation prend fin. L`ultime Getsuga Tenshô est libéré
Gekitou Kecchaku! Hanate, Saigo no Getsuga Tenshou!
episode.summary: Battle ensues between Aizen and Ichigo. His nineties-level Kido attack easily deflected, Aizen further evolves to best Ichigo. But Ichigo, now fully aware of why Tensa Zangetsu was reluctant to teach him the Final Getsugatensho, has come to possess amazing powers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 就任! 新たなる二番隊隊長!
Inauguration! The Brand New 2nd Division Captain!
L`inauguration du tout nouveau capitaine de la 2e division
Shuunin! Arata Naru Ni-Ban Tai Taichou!
episode.summary: While slacking off on his duties, Omaeda falls from a cliff. Recovering from the fall, Omaeda finds a young boy named Ryuzaburo staring at him with admiration and learns that he has unintentionally saved the boy’s life from a Hollow. When asked for his name, Omaeda lies and says he is the captain of Squad 2. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魂葬刑事・カラクライザー再発進!
The Soul Detective - Karakuraizer Takes Off Again!
Le Soul Détective. Le Karakuraizer réapparait
Konsou Keiji Karakuraizer Saihasshin!
episode.summary: Karakurizer is back! As Karakurizer, Kon tries to impress the ladies when a man named Michel appears. Strong, kind, handsome, and a true hero, Michel instantly gains popularity from the townspeople and the other Karakurizer. Can Karakurizer reclaim the title of No. 1 hero?! Go, Karakurizer! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: やちるの友! 正義の死神登場!
Yachiru`s Friend! The Shinigami of Justice Appears!
L`ami de Yachiru. L`apparition du Shinigami de la justice
Yachiru no Tomo! Seigi no Shinigami Toujou!
episode.summary: Yachiru encounters a Soul Reaper saving a girl from a Hollow, and quickly recognizes him as Masayoshi, her old friend. As the two celebrate their reunion, Yachiru learns that “Mappy” has lost his wife to a Hollow. Since then, Masayoshi has sworn to kill all Hollows for the people of the Rukon District, and for his late wife. But something about Masayoshi’s story does not sit well with Yachiru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美人OLの秘密
Secret of a Beautiful Office Lady
Kon l`a vu. Le secret d`une jolie femme de bureau
Bijin OL no Himitsu
episode.summary: While Ichigo is looking into a possible Hollow incident in the World of the Living, Kon, inside Ichigo’s body, meets a beautiful woman who can see spirits. But the woman was dumped by her boyfriend because of this power and now wishes to die. Kon tries to stop the woman from killing herself when a handsome Hollow appears! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 十一番隊に命を懸けた男!
The Man Who Takes Command of the 11th Division!
L`homme aux commandes de la 11e division
Juu-Ichi-Ban Tai ni Inochi o Kaketa Otoko!
episode.summary: While sparring with Ikkaku and Renji inside Squad 11’s dojo, Ichigo meets Seizo, whose mild-mannered personality seems out of place within the hot-blooded Squad 11. Once a powerful Soul Reaper, Seizo lost most of his spirit energy after taking a hit from a Hollow meant for Ikkaku. Ichigo, having seen Seizo’s unfair treatment within the squad, questions if he is truly content with his current life. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 日番谷冬獅郎(ひつがやとうしろう)の休日!
Hitsugaya Toushirou`s Day Off!
Les vacances de Hitsugaya Toshirô
Hitsugaya Toushirou no Kyuujitsu!
episode.summary: Hitsugaya has taken some time off and comes to Karakura Town to visit Haru, an old lady he met during a previous visit to the World of the Living. Grandma Haru introduces Hitsugaya and Karin to Yosuke, a young spirit who died before being able to experience his first snow. Hitsugaya decides to wait on performing Konso on Yosuke until the boy gets his wish, when Haru’s health suddenly worsens… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 14
護廷十三隊, 現世に集結!
Gotei 13, Gathering in the Real World!
Gotei 13, réunion dans le monde réel
Gotei Juu-San Tai, Gensei ni Shuuketsu!
episode.summary: The Thirteen Court Guard Squads who attacked Ichigo and Rukia in the Soul Society are revealed to be imposters known as Reigai, who have switched places with their originals. Thanks to the work of Mayuri, the real captains and lieutenants are rescued from the Precipice World, and they all regroup in the World of the Living to discuss how to deal with this new crisis. Meanwhile, to help Nozomi feel welcomed, Ichigo and the others decide to host a barbecue party, when Nozomi suddenly runs off. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護捕縛網! 尸魂界を脱出せよ!
Ichigo`s Capture Net! Escape From Soul Society!
Le filet de capture d`Ichigo. S`échapper de la Soul Society
Ichigo Hobakumou! Soul Society o Dasshutsu seyo!
episode.summary: Ichigo and Rukia find stored records on Nozomi at the Department of Research and Development, and realize the World of the Living is in danger. Hurrying to get back, the two regroup with Yoruichi, who proposes to get past the heavily guarded Senkaimon by force. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Kon and Nozomi find themselves attacked by Kira, Nanao, and a Soul Reaper calling himself Kageroza. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋次(れんじ)vsルキア!? 仲間との戦い!
Renji vs. Rukia?! Battle With Comrades!
Renji contre Rukia. Batailles entre camarades
Renji vs Rukia!? Nakama to no Tatakai!
episode.summary: Ichigo is placed under arrest by the Soul Society under suspicion of being responsible for the disappearance of the Soul Reapers in the Precipice World. With Rukia’s help, the two make an escape, when Renji and Ikkaku appear to do battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 瀞霊廷(せいれいてい)に異変! 護廷(ごてい)十三隊侵軍篇!
Unusual Incident in Seireitei?! Gotei 13 Invading Army Arc!
Incident inhabituel au Seireitei
Seireitei ni Ihen! Gotei Juu-San Tai Shingun Hen!
episode.summary: Peace has seemingly returned to both the World of the Living and the Soul Society with Aizen’s defeat. But reports of Soul Reapers going missing after entering the Precipice World begin to surface in the Soul Society. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Kon finds an unconscious girl lying in the street and brings her home to care for, while Ichigo and Rukia discover that they are unable to contact the Soul Society. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 27
影狼佐を倒せ! 死神, 総力戦!
Defeat Kageroza! Shinigami, All-Out War!
Vaincre Kageroza. Shinigami, guerre totale
Kagerouza o Taose! Shinigami, Souryokusen!
episode.summary: Captains Hitsugaya and Kenpachi have located Kageroza and proceed to attack him, but Kageroza retaliates by controlling the Precipice World to his advantage. Back in the World of the Living, Nozomi and the others continue their search for the missing Ichigo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 朽木家の誇り! 白哉VS白哉!
Pride of the Kuchiki Family! Byakuya Vs. Byakuya!
La fierté de la famille Kuchiki. Byakuya contre Byakuya
Kuchiki-ke no Hokori! Byakuya VS Byakuya!
episode.summary: Captains of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads continue their battle to reclaim the Soul Society. Head Captain Yamamoto takes on the Reigai of Kyoraku and Ukitake, but is gradually overwhelmed by the two. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Nozomi and the others learn of Ichigo’s disappearance inside the Precipice World. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ふたりの雛森, 日番谷の覚悟
The Two Hinamori, Hitsugaya`s Resolution
Deux Hinamori, la détermination de Hitsugaya
Futari no Hinamori, Hitsugaya no Kakugo
episode.summary: Ichigo leaves for the Soul Society to join the battle, only to be ambushed by Kageroza, who intends to erase Ichigo’s existence. Back in the Soul Society, the wounded captains find themselves facing new Reigai to battle, while Hitsugaya is reunited with Hinamori. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 信ずるものの為に! 白哉(びゃくや)vs日番谷(ひつがや)!
For the Sake of the Believers! Byakuya vs. Hitsugaya!
Hitsugaya contre Byakuya
Shinzuru Mono no Tame ni! Byakuya vs Hitsugaya!
episode.summary: Moved by Ichigo and his friends’ efforts to protect her, Nozomi decides to stay with the group and begins to use her powers to heal Ichigo. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, Byakuya faces the Reigai of Hitsugaya. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 瀞霊廷(せいれいてい)奪還へ! 隊長たち, 動く!
Recapture Seireitei!
Reprendre le Seireitei. Les capitaines en action
Seireitei Dakkan e! Taichou-tachi, Ugoku!
episode.summary: The captains of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads take action to reclaim the Soul Society back from the Reigai. As they successfully reenter the Soul Society, Kenpachi encounters his Reigai, and a fierce battle ensues. Meanwhile, Genryusai battles the Reigai of Kyoraku and Ukitake but notices something odd about their movements. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 護れ一護! 望実の決意!
Protect Ichigo! Nozomi`s Determination!
Protéger Nozomi. La détermination d`Ichigo
Mamore Ichigo! Nozomi no Ketsui!
episode.summary: Chad encounters Renji’s Reigai while searching for Nozomi, and a battle ensues between the two. Meanwhile, Unohana grows suspicious over the events surrounding Kyoraku’s arrest, and begins to conduct her own research. In the process, Unohana learns that Kageroza is the mastermind behind this incident. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! ルキアVSルキア!
Clash! Rukia vs. Rukia!
Rukia contre Rukia
Gekitotsu! Rukia vs Rukia!
episode.summary: Rangiku faces the Reigai of Izuru, but the imposter’s Zanpakuto proves to be more powerful then she anticipated. Rukia is also having a tough battle against the Reigai of herself and Nemu, when help arrives from an unexpected person. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, Ukitake pleads for Kyoraku’s release to Central 46. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一角(いっかく)vs一角! 自分同士の戦い!
Ikkaku vs. Ikkaku! Showdown of Mutual Self!
Épreuve de force face à soi-même, Ikkaku contre Ikkaku
Ikkaku vs Ikkaku! Jibun Doushi no Tatakai!
episode.summary: Kon goes out to search for Nozomi and finds her wandering aimlessly. Meanwhile, the Soul Society has assembled a special team, including the Reigai of Ikkaku, Yumichika, and Hisagi, to apprehend Ichigo. The Reigai arrive in the World of the Living where they encounter their originals, and a battle ensues! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 禁断の研究... 望実に隠された秘密!
The Forbidden Research... Nozomi`s Hidden Secret!
La recherche interdite... Le secret caché de Nozomi
Kindan no Kenkyuu... Nozomi ni Kakusareta Himitsu!
episode.summary: Ichigo, who was swept away by the Cleaner inside the Precipice World, has safely returned to the World of the Living to everyone’s delight. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, the Reigai are revealed to be Mod Souls created by Kageroza. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生きたい...! 望実の斬魄刀
I Want to Live...! Nozomi`s Zanpakutou
Je veux vivre... Le Zanpakutô de Nozomi
Ikitai...! Nozomi no Zanpakutou
episode.summary: The Soul Reapers in the World of the Living have lost contact with the captains in the Soul Society. Meanwhile, the revelation of Nozomi being a Mod Soul surprises Ichigo and his friends. Kon is particularly shocked, and is now unsure of how to interact with Nozomi. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 失われる霊圧! 一護, 魂の死闘!
The Depleting Reiatsu! Ichigo, Death Struggle of the Soul!
Le Reiatsu diminuant. Ichigo, lutte mortelle contre son âme
Ushinawareru Reiatsu! Ichigo, Tamashii no Shitou!
episode.summary: Nozomi’s Zanpakuto breaks in the midst of trying to protect Genryusai from Kageroza’s attack. As Ichigo and Kon try to save Nozomi from being taken away, Kageroza reveals a shocking secret between him and Nozomi. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 望実を消す!? 元柳斎(げんりゅうさい)の決断!
Destroy Nozomi!? Genryuusai`s Decision!
Détruire Nozomi. La décision de Genryusai
Nozomi o Kesu!? Genryuusai no Ketsudan!
episode.summary: Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto steps in to battle against the Reigai. Ichigo and Nozomi join Genryusai, each taking on the Reigai of captains Unohana, Ukitake, and Kyoraku. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最凶の霊骸(れいがい), 現世に現る!
The Most Evil Reigai, Appearing in the Real World!
Le plus mauvais Reigai, apparition dans le monde réel
Saikyou no Reigai, Gense ni Arawaru!
episode.summary: Having regained her Shikai, Nozomi tries to join Ichigo and the others to fight the Reigai captains, but the other Soul Reapers tell her not to interfere. In the midst of the battle, Hisagi and Izuru are brought down by the Reigai of Hitsugaya, who prepares to finish off the two lieutenants. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦うために! 目覚めよ望実!
For the Sake of Fighting! The Awakened Nozomi!
Pour combattre. Le réveil de Nozomi
Tatakau Tame ni! Mezameyo Nozomi!
episode.summary: Nozomi wishes to join the battle against the Reigai, believing her Zanpakuto may stand a chance against Kageroza’s Zanpakuto. But the Soul Reapers are unable to completely trust Nozomi due to her power not being fully awakened yet. Ichigo and his friends decide to help Nozomi by training her to reach Shikai. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 28a
Ending 5b
Opening 5b (Episodes 106-109, Movie Footage)
Ending 9b (Episodes 106-109, Movie Footage)
Ending 28d
Ending 28c
Ending 28b
コンの想い, 望実の想い
Kon`s Thoughts, Nozomi`s Thoughts
Les sentiments de Kon, les sentiments de Nozomi
Kon no Omoi, Nozomi no Omoi
episode.summary: Inside the Maggot’s Nest, Urahara and Kon find Ouko Yushima, the man behind Kageroza’s invasion. Finding traces of Kageroza’s blood nearby, the two follow the trail and finally discover Nozomi’s whereabouts. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 改造魂魄(こんぱく)の開発者
The Developer of the Modified Souls
Le développeur des âmes modifiées
Kaizou Konpaku no Kaihatsusha
episode.summary: The captains and lieutenants of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads thought to have fallen in battle return to fight the Reigai. Meanwhile, Ichigo’s spirit energy and Hollow powers continue to grow unstable, forcing him to rest for the time being. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 影狼佐(かげろうざ)を追え! 技術開発局, 潜入!
Pursue Kageroza! Technological Development Department, Infiltration!
À la poursuite de Kageroza. Infiltration dans le département de recherche technologique
Kagerouza o Oe! Gijutsu Kaihatsukyoku, Sennyuu!
episode.summary: Inside the Precipice World, Rukia and the others act as decoys to draw away the Reigai’s attention while Ichigo, Urahara, and Kon break into the Seireitei. As they search for Kageroza’s laboratory, Urahara makes an attempt to restore Ichigo’s lost Soul Reaper powers but is discovered by the Reigai of Nemu and Nanao. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 断界(だんがい)に潜伏? もう一人の一護(いちご)!?
Hiding in the Dangai? Ichigo is Alone?!
Caché dans le Dangai. Un 2e Ichigo
Dangai ni Senpuku? Mou Hitori no Ichigo!?
episode.summary: Following his defeat by Kageroza, Ichigo has lost his Soul Reaper powers. Still determined to save Nozomi, Ichigo and his friends gather at Urahara’s shop to come up with a rescue plan. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霊骸vs原種, 誇りを賭けた激闘!
Reigai Vs. Original, The Fierce Fighting for Gambled Pride!
Reigai contre l`original, le combat féroce de la fierté
Reigai VS Genshu, Hokori o Kaketa Gekitou!
episode.summary: The captains of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads find themselves gradually overpowered by the Reigai forces. Meanwhile, Rukia, Uryu, Renji and Chad use their teamwork to fight Kageroza. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護を護れ! 仲間たちの絆!
Protect Ichigo! The Bonds of Friends!
Protéger Ichigo. Le Lien de l`amitié
Ichigo o Mamore! Nakama-tachi no Kizuna!
episode.summary: Kageroza, having regained his complete powers, sets out to kill the Hollowfied Ichigo when Rukia, Uryu, Renji, Chad, and Orihime arrive to stop him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 28f
Ending 28e
Ending 28g
Ending 28h
Ending 28i
ありがとう
Thank You
Merci
Arigatou
episode.summary: Returning to the World of the Living, Ichigo spends his days hunting down Hollows with what little Spirit Energy he has left. However, knowing that Ichigo cannot continue this much longer, Rukia soon realizes the time of their parting is fast approaching. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 侵軍篇, 最終決着!
Invading Army Arc, Final Conclusion!
L`armée d`invasion, conclusion finale
Shingun Hen, Saishuu Kecchaku!
episode.summary: An unexpected change comes over the Reigai as the Soul Reapers continue to fight them. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Kageroza have their final showdown. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 28j
Ending 28k
Ending 28l
高校3年生! 装い新たに新章開始!
3rd Year High School Student! Dressed up, and a New Chapter Begins!
Lycéen de 3e année. Paré pour le début d`un nouveau chapitre
Koukou 3 Nensei! Yosooi Arata ni Shinshou Kaishi!
episode.summary: A year has passed since Ichigo lost his Soul Reaper powers, becoming a normal teenager. Now in his final year of high school, Ichigo lives an ordinary life surrounded by his family and friends. Despite finally getting the life he always wanted, Ichigo still feels as if something is lacking, when a mysterious man appears before him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 28m
黒崎家に忍び寄る危機!? 一護の迷い!
A Creeping Danger in the Kurosaki Family?! Ichigo`s Confusion!
Un effrayant danger dans la famille Kurosaki. La confusion d`Ichigo
Kurosaki-ke ni Shinobiyoru Kiki!? Ichigo no Mayoi!
episode.summary: Ginjo gives Ichigo a day to decide whether to regain his lost Soul Reaper powers or not. But Ichigo, who no longer wishes to endanger anyone by being a Soul Reaper, decides to decline the offer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 完現術(フルブリング)の能力者·銀城空吾
The Fullbring User: Ginjou Kuugo
L`utilisateur du Fullbring, Ginjô Kûgo
Fullbring no Nouryokusha: Ginjou Kuugo
episode.summary: Unable to bear seeing his friends get attacked, Ichigo decides to call on Ginjo for some answers. At his hideout, “Xcution,” Ginjo tells Ichigo of his goal to restore Ichigo’s lost Soul Reaper powers, as well as demonstrating his own unique power, “Fullbring.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 襲われた雨竜, 仲間達に迫る脅威!
Uryu is Attacked, A Threat Draws Near the Friends!
Uryû est attaqué, une menace se tisse autour de ses amis
Osowareta Uryuu, Nakama-tachi ni Semaru Kyoui!
episode.summary: Uryu is rushed to the hospital after being cut down by an unknown attacker. As Ichigo becomes frustrated over not being able to do anything when his friend was attacked, he learns that Keigo and Mizuro have disappeared. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 学校間抗争!? 一護と雨竜, 共闘!
A Dispute in School?! Ichigo and Uryuu, Fight Together!
Un conflit au lycée. Ichigo et Uryû combattent ensemble
Gakkoukan Kousou!? Ichigo to Uryuu, Kyoutou!
episode.summary: Ichigo and Uryu deal with delinquents from another school that come looking for trouble. Following the incident, Ichigo’s boss Unagiya shows up and drags Ichigo back to the office, where he meets a man called Kugo Ginjo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 15a
Ending 29
代行証の力, 一護の"誇り"
Power of the Substitute Badge, Ichigo`s "Pride"!
Le pouvoir du badge du Shinigami remplaçant fait la fierté d`Ichigo
Daikoushou no Chikara, Ichigo no "Hokori"
episode.summary: Ichigo begins training to regain his Soul Reaper powers at the Xcution’s hideout. His first training is to fight and win against Mr. Pork, an opponent created by Riruka’s Fullbring power “Dollhouse.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フルブリング, 忌み嫌われた力
Fullbring, The Detested Power!
Le Fullbring, le pouvoir détesté
Fullbring, Imikirawareta Chikara
episode.summary: Ichigo asks Ginjo to let him fight one of the Xcution members for his training. But Jackie, who detests the power of Fullbring, finds Ichigo’s request selfish and refuses. Meanwhile, danger closes in on Chad. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死神代行を殺した男!?動き出す月島
The Man Who Killed the Shinigami Substitute?! Tsukishima Makes His Move
L`homme qui a tué un shinigami remplaçant. Tsukishima se met en mouvement
Shinigami Daikou o Koroshita Otoko!? Ugokidasu Tsukishima
episode.summary: Ichigo and Chad rush to find Orihime, who they believe may be in danger. Meanwhile, Orihime attempts to stop Tsukishima from leaving the scene, but is instead stabbed by his Fullbring power, “Book of The End.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 次の標的, 織姫を狙う魔の手
Next Target, The Devil`s Hand Aims at Orihime!
Prochaine cible, la main diabolique vise Orihime
Tsugi no Hyouteki, Orihime o Nerau Ma no Te!
episode.summary: On her way home from school, Orihime is suddenly stopped and asked to die by a man named Shishigawara. Confused at first, Orihime quickly realizes that Shishigawara may be related to Uryu’s attacker, and prepares to fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 月島, 強襲! 妨害された修行
Tsukishima Attacks! The Training Has Been Thwarted
L`attaque de Tsukishima. L`entrainement a été saboté
Tsukishima, Kyoushuu! Bougai Sareta Shugyou
episode.summary: Ichigo begins his training with Jackie Tristan, who brings out her Fullbring power “Dirty Boots.” As he goes up against Jackie’s powerful attacks, Ichigo begins to gradually understand the use of his own Fullbring power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 護, 完現術を使いこなせ!
Ichigo, Mastering the Fullbring!
Ichigo maîtrise le Fullbring
Ichigo, Fullbring Jutsu o Tsukai Konase!
episode.summary: Tsukishima breaks into the Xcution hideout where Ichigo is training. Learning that he was the one who attacked Uryu and Orihime, a furious Ichigo proceeds to attack Tsukishima. But with his Fullbring power still incomplete, Ichigo finds himself gradually overpowered by his opponent. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 護vs銀城, ゲームの空間へ
Ichigo vs. Ginjou! To the Game`s Space
Ichigo contre Ginjô dans l`espace du jeu
Ichigo vs Ginjou, Game no Kuukan e
episode.summary: Uryu asks Orihime to heal his injuries after sensing that his assailant has now made contact with Ichigo. Meanwhile, Ichigo enters his training with Ginjo inside Yukio’s Fulbring power “Invaders Must Die.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 哀しみの戦い! 一護VS茶渡 & 織姫!
The Sorrowful Battle! Ichigo vs. Sado & Orihime!
Le triste combat. Ichigo contre Chad et Orihime
Kanashimi no Tatakai! Ichigo VS Sado & Orihime!
episode.summary: Ichigo escapes from his house in confusion after witnessing his friends and family welcoming Tsukishima as if they’ve known him for years. Regrouping with Ginjo, Ichigo learns that the same change has also happened to Riruka and the other Xcution members. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突!? 銀城を襲うXCUTION
Clash?! Xcution Attacks Ginjou
L`Xcution a frappé Ginjô
Gekitotsu!? Ginjou o Osou Xcution
episode.summary: Uryu begins his own investigation to track down the enemy who attacked him. As he goes around searching for clues, he notices that people close to Ichigo are acting strangely. Meanwhile, Ichigo’s Fullbring training is nearing its completion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍び寄る脅威... 月島の能力!
Creeping Menace... Tsukishima`s Ability!
La capacité de la menace rampante, Tsukishima
Shinobiyoru Kyoui... Tsukishima no Nouryoku!
episode.summary: Orihime and Chad exchange what information they have about Tsukishima to figure out what he has done to the both of them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敵か味方か!? 銀城の見えない心!
Foe or Friend?! Ginjou`s Unseen Heart!
Un ennemi ou un ami. Le cœur invisible de Ginjô
Teki ka Mikata ka!? Ginjou no Mienai Kokoro!
episode.summary: Ichigo, with Orihime standing by as his healer, enters his training with Ginjo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死神参戦! 瀞霊廷もお正月SP!
The Shinigami Enter Battle! Seireitei Also Has a New Year Special!
Les Shinigami entrent dans la bataille. Le Seireitei a aussi un Nouvel An spécial
Shinigami Sansen! Seireitei mo Oshougatsu SP!
episode.summary: On New Year’s Day, Izuru hosts a kite-flying contest in the hopes of everyone having a good time. Meanwhile, Rukia is practicing a dance she will perform for the New Year’s Celebration Ceremony but cannot seem to get the steps right. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 30
一護VS雨竜!? 裏切り者は誰だ!
Ichigo vs. Uryuu?! Who is the Traitor?!
Ichigo contre Uryû. Qui est le traître
Ichigo vs Uryuu!? Uragirimono wa Dare Da!
episode.summary: Ichigo is shocked to learn that Chad and Orihime have now sided with Tsukishima and are even willing to fight Ichigo to protect their precious “friend.” Meanwhile, Ginjo races to help Ichigo, but the remaining members of Xcution halt his attempt. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復活! 死神代行·黒崎一護!
Revival! Substitute Shinigami - Ichigo Kurosaki!
Retour d`Ichigo Kurosaki, le Shinigami remplaçant
Fukkatsu! Shinigami Daikou Kurosaki Ichigo!
episode.summary: Under the orders of Head Captain Yamamoto, the 13 Court Guard Squad Soul Reapers share their Spirit Energy to restore Ichigo’s lost powers. With his Soul Reaper powers fully restored, Ichigo returns to challenge Ginjo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たな姿! 護廷十三隊, 見参!
A New Appearance! Meet the Gotei 13!
Une nouvelle apparence. Rencontre avec le Gotei 13
Arata na Sugata! Gotei Juu-San Tai, Kenzan!
episode.summary: Ginjo reveals his true colors by attacking Ichigo and stripping him of his Fullbring powers. Ichigo lies in despair from losing his powers yet again, when his father Isshin and Kisuke Urahara arrive. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘! 死神vsXCUTION!
Fierce Fight! Shinigami vs. XCUTION!
Les Shinigami contre l`Xcution
Gekitou! Shinigami vs Xcution!
episode.summary: The Soul Reapers take on the Xcution members in one-on-one battles. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Uryu prepare to take on Ginjo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening 15b
絶体絶命!? 記憶を挟まれた白哉
Desperate Struggle!? Byakuya`s Troubled Memories
Lutte désespérée. Les pensées troubles de Byakuya
Zettai Zetsumei!? Kioku o Hasamareta Byakuya
episode.summary: The battle between Byakuya and Tsukishima escalates as they both push their powers to the limit. Meanwhile, Rukia struggles against the cute traps set up by Riruka. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一護VS銀城! 代行証の秘密
Ichigo vs. Ginjou! The Secret of the Substitute Badge
Ichigo contre Ginjô. Le secret du badge de Shinigami remplaçant
Ichigo vs Ginjou! Daikoushou no Himitsu
episode.summary: While facing each other in battle, Uryu notices that Ginjo’s attack contains the presence of Ichigo’s Spirit Energy. Ignoring Uryu’s warning, Ichigo fires his Getsugatensho attack, only to be countered by Ginjo’s own Getsugatensho attack. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 変わりゆく歴史, 変わらぬ心
Changing History, Unchanging Heart
L’histoire change mais le cœur reste inchangé
Kawariyuku Rekishi, Kawaranu Kokoro
episode.summary: Ichigo and Ginjo both release their Bankai to settle the score once and for all. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カラブリ! 護廷十三屋台大作戦!
Jump Festa Anime Tour 2008
Bleach Colorful! Jump Festa 2008 Special
Karaburi! Gotei Juusan Yatai Daisakusen!
episode.summary: An animated adaptation of Tedious Everyday Tales Colorful Bleach chapters 29-36.

episode.title: Opening 15c
